translated: and the subject to be established is established,üîΩthen the example subject is also near.

original: de'i chos khyab pas dpe'i chos can la yod par grub pa'i phyir ;
analyzed: de'i chos khyab pas dpe'i chos can la yod par grub pa'i phyir ;
translated: Because the pervasion of its property is established in the example subject,

original: chos can gyi chos smos pas ni /
analyzed: chos can gyi chos smos pas ni /
translated: by mentioning the property of the subject,

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can yongs su bsdus so //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can yongs su bsdus so //
translated: the subject to be established is included.

original: bsgrub kyang nges par bya ba'i phyir yang smos su dogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bsgrub kyang nges par bya ba'i phyir yang smos su dogs par 'gyur te /
translated: Even if it is established, it is mentioned again because it is suspected that it needs to be ascertained.

original: mthun pa la yod pa kho nas ldog pa la de med par grub mod kyi /
analyzed: mthun pa la yod pa kho nas ldog pa la de med par grub mod kyi /
translated: Although it is established that the absence of the reason in the dissimilar instances is due to its presence only in the similar instances,

original: bsgrub par bya ba med pa la med pa zhes smos pa bzhin du /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba med pa la med pa zhes smos pa bzhin du /
translated: just as the absence of the property of the subject is mentioned in the absence of the probandum,

original: de'i chos khyab pa smos pas /
analyzed: de'i chos khyab pa smos pas /
translated: by mentioning the pervasion of its property,

original: gal te phyogs kyi chos nyid yin na /
analyzed: gal te phyogs kyi chos nyid yin na /
translated: If it is the property of the subject,

analyzed: de'i khyad par la ltos pa gzhan du mi 'jug go zhe na /
translated: then its distinction does not apply elsewhere.

original: ma yin te ma 'brel ba rnam par bcad pas bye brag tu byas pa'i phyir dper na nag pa gzhu thogs so zhes bya ba lta bu yin gyi /
analyzed: ma yin te ma 'brel ba rnam par bcad pas bye brag tu byas pa'i phyir dper na nag pa gzhu thogs so zhes bya ba lta bu yin gyi /
translated: No, because it is specified by the exclusion of non-connection, like saying Ngapa holds a bow,

original: dper na srid sgrub gzhu thogs pa lta bu'o /
analyzed: dper na srid sgrub gzhu thogs pa lta bu'o /
translated: but not like saying Arjuna holds a bow,

original: zhes gzhan dang 'brel ba rnam par bcad pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: zhes gzhan dang 'brel ba rnam par bcad pas ni ma yin no //
translated: because it is not specified by the exclusion of connection with another.

original: de'i cha ni de'i chos so //üîΩkhyab pa ni de la khyab par byed pa yod pa kho na'am /
analyzed: de'i cha ni de'i chos so // khyab pa ni de la khyab par byed pa yod pa kho na'am /

original: yang na de kho na la khyab par bya ba yod pa'o //
analyzed: yang na de kho na la khyab par bya ba yod pa'o //
translated: or the existence of the pervaded there.

original: 'dis rjes su 'gro ba'am /
analyzed: 'dis rjes su 'gro ba'am /
translated: This is the pervasion.

translated: I have explained the three characteristics of a correct reason as they are ascertained by one's own valid cognition.

original: khyab pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir ram /
analyzed: khyab pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir ram /
translated: Because if the property to be established does not exist in all similar instances, the pervasion is not established.

original: yang na khyab par byed pa log na ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na khyab par byed pa log na ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Or, if the pervader is absent, the pervaded is also absent.

translated: by means of direct perception or inference is the forward pervasion.

original: sgra la byas pa nyid lta bu'o //
analyzed: sgra la byas pa nyid lta bu'o //
translated: For example, smoke on a mountain pass or sound's being a product.

translated: Having seen in that way, by the power of direct perception, the memory consciousness that is the expression of the uncommonness of that which is uncommon is produced. It has an object that is the opposite of not being that.

analyzed: de'i rang gi mtshan nyid gzung ba'i 'og tu 'byung ba sngon po rnam par rtog pa'i yul @239b gyis ni /
translated: The object of the conception of blue is the object that arises after the apprehension of its own characteristics.üîΩ

analyzed: sngon po don gyis bsgrub par bya ba'i don bya ba sgrub par mi byed de /

analyzed: tshad ma rnam par gzhag pa ni dngos po la brten pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the presentation of valid cognitions is based on things.

original: de'i don du 'jug pa ni don byed par rung ba'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i don du 'jug pa ni don byed par rung ba'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because engaging in the object is having an object that is suitable for performing a function.

original: dngos po ni don byed par rung ba'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po ni don byed par rung ba'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because a real thing is defined as that which is able to perform a function.

original: rnam par rtog pa de las kyang de la lhag par chags pas /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa de las kyang de la lhag par chags pas /
translated: And from that conceptual thought, there is attachment to that object,

original: dngos po kho na la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po kho na la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it engages only a real thing.

original: zhugs nas mngon dang rnam par rtog pa grub pa dang bde ba mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhugs nas mngon dang rnam par rtog pa grub pa dang bde ba mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Having engaged, there is the attainment of conceptual thought, and the non-attainment of pleasure.

original: gal te mngon sum snga ma dang phyi ma rnams su 'ga' zhig la nye bar sbyor ba tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //üîΩtshad ma nyid ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te mngon sum snga ma dang phyi ma rnams su 'ga' zhig la nye bar sbyor ba tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro // tshad ma nyid ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If it is argued that it is not a valid cognition because it is not different from the previous and subsequent direct perceptions,

original: ma yin te skad cig ma'i bye brag gis bsgrub par bya ba'i don du 'dod pa la grub pa dang / bde ba tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te skad cig ma'i bye brag gis bsgrub par bya ba'i don du 'dod pa la grub pa dang / bde ba tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: that is not so, because the object to be established is accepted as being different in terms of the distinction of momentariness, and because of the difference in pleasure.

original: 'bras bu thun mong ba zam gyi bsgrub par bya ba'i don la du ba gzhan dang gzhan gyis gzhal ba'i me nye ba bzhin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu thun mong ba zam gyi bsgrub par bya ba'i don la du ba gzhan dang gzhan gyis gzhal ba'i me nye ba bzhin no //
translated: It is like the common effect, the object to be established, where the fire is nearby, due to the other and other smoke.

original: 'dis ni chos dang chos can dang rtags la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa tshad ma'i rjes la 'byung ba tshad ma nyid du bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni chos dang chos can dang rtags la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa tshad ma'i rjes la 'byung ba tshad ma nyid du bsal ba yin no //
translated: This passage shows that conceptual thought, which occurs after the valid cognition of a fact, is itself a valid cognition.

original: rjes su 'gro ba nges pa yang rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dngos su na de'i ngo bo can nyid yin pas /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba nges pa yang rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dngos su na de'i ngo bo can nyid yin pas /
translated: As for the ascertainment of the positive concomitance, in the case of a natural sign, the probandum is actually the nature of the sign itself.

original: sgrub pa'i chos kyi ngo bo tsam dang rjes su 'brel par grub pa yin no //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i chos kyi ngo bo tsam dang rjes su 'brel par grub pa yin no //
translated: So the sign is established as being related to the mere nature of the probandum.

original: de ni bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa la gtan tshigs kyi gnod pa can gyi tshad ma 'jug pa yin te dper na gang yod pa de ni skad cig ma kho na yin no //
analyzed: de ni bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa la gtan tshigs kyi gnod pa can gyi tshad ma 'jug pa yin te dper na gang yod pa de ni skad cig ma kho na yin no //
translated: The negative concomitance is established by the application of a valid cognition that contradicts the presence of the reason in the counter-example. For example, whatever exists is momentary,

original: skad cig ma nyid ma yin na don byed pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir de'i mtshan nyid dngos po nyid nyams par 'gyur blta bu'o //
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid ma yin na don byed pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir de'i mtshan nyid dngos po nyid nyams par 'gyur blta bu'o //
translated: because being non-momentary is incompatible with performing a function, and that would undermine its being a thing, which is defined as being functional.

original: 'bras bu'i tshigs kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo grub pa yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i tshigs kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo grub pa yin te /
translated: In the case of a causal sign, the relation between cause and effect is established.

original: 'di lta ste 'di dmigs na dmigs pa'i @240a * //
analyzed: 'di lta ste 'di dmigs na dmigs pa'i @240a * //
translated: For example, when this is perceived, the perception of the object of perception, the blue, is not perceived.

original: rig byar gyur pa sngon po mi dmigs pa 'di dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: rig byar gyur pa sngon po mi dmigs pa 'di dmigs pa yin no //
translated: This is the perception of the non-perception of the object of perception.

original: rgyu gzhan dag yod kyang 'di med na med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyu gzhan dag yod kyang 'di med na med pa'i phyir /
translated: Even when other causes exist, if this does not exist, it does not exist.

original: de yod na ni yod med na ni med bas /
analyzed: de yod na ni yod med na ni med bas /
translated: If this exists, it exists. If this does not exist, it does not exist.

analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo ni mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa'i grub pa can yin te /

original: de grub pa'o //
analyzed: de grub pa'o //

original: de ltar na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo ni don tha dad pa kho nar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de ltar na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo ni don tha dad pa kho nar 'gyur la /

original: gang na du ba yod pa de na gdon mi za bar me yod de /
analyzed: gang na du ba yod pa de na gdon mi za bar me yod de /
translated: Where there is smoke, there is definitely fire.

original: me yod na yod pa kho na de'i 'bras bu nyid du ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: me yod na yod pa kho na de'i 'bras bu nyid du ba yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: mi dmigs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba nges pa yang med pa'i tha snyad dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa mi dmigs pa tsam 'jig pa'i sgrub pa can yin te /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba nges pa yang med pa'i tha snyad dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa mi dmigs pa tsam 'jig pa'i sgrub pa can yin te /
translated: The invariable concomitance of non-perception is the mere non-perception of the object of perception, which is the proof of the negation.

original: rgyu mtshan gzhan med par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gzhan med par mthong ba'i phyir ro //

translated: The ascertainment of the contrapositive is as follows: When the reason is an effect or an essence, if the effect or the pervader is established, then the cause or the pervader is not observed in a suitable place.

original: bsgrub par bya ba med na gtan tshigs 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba med na gtan tshigs 'grub pa'o //

original: yul bstan pa can med par nye bar ston pa la /
analyzed: yul bstan pa can med par nye bar ston pa la /

original: de lta ma yin na dmigs pa'i rig byar ma gyur pa gang du yang med par mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na dmigs pa'i rig byar ma gyur pa gang du yang med par mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would not be established that the probandum is absent anywhere that is not an object of observation.

original: yul ma bstan pa can ni bsgrub par bya ba med na med par ston pa yin te /
analyzed: yul ma bstan pa can ni bsgrub par bya ba med na med par ston pa yin te /
translated: When the reason is a nonobservation of something suitable to appear, it shows that the probandum is absent.

original: 'brel pa tsam grub na 'grub pas de las ni ldog pa bsgrub par bya ba mi dmigs pa yul ltar rung ba ltos pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'brel pa tsam grub na 'grub pas de las ni ldog pa bsgrub par bya ba mi dmigs pa yul ltar rung ba ltos pa ma yin no //
translated: When the mere relationship is established, the reason is established. Therefore, in that case, the contrapositive is not established by the nonobservation of something suitable to appear.

original: mi dmigs pa'i log pa nges pa ni dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa mi dmigs pa med pa nye bar ston pa'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i log pa nges pa ni dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa mi dmigs pa med pa nye bar ston pa'o //
translated: The ascertainment of the contrapositive of a nonobservation is the demonstration of the absence of the nonobservation of something suitable to appear.

original: mtshan nyid de lta bu can de ni rnam pa gsum /
analyzed: mtshan nyid de lta bu can de ni rnam pa gsum /
translated: This is the definition of a reason.

original: gtan tshigs ni rnam pa gsum kho na ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ni rnam pa gsum kho na ste /
translated: There are only three kinds of reasons.

original: rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dang / mi dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dang / mi dmigs pa yin te /
translated: They are reasons from identity, reasons from effect, and reasons from non-existence.

original: dper na 'ga' zhig mi rtag pa bsgrub par bya ba la yod pa lta bu dang / me dang ldan pa'i phyogs la du ba lta bu dang / med pa la dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na 'ga' zhig mi rtag pa bsgrub par bya ba la yod pa lta bu dang / me dang ldan pa'i phyogs la du ba lta bu dang / med pa la dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, in the proof that sound is impermanent, existence is a reason from identity. In the proof that a place possessing fire possesses smoke, smoke is a reason from effect. In the proof that a pot does not exist because it is not perceived by valid cognition, the non-perception of something perceptible is a reason from non-existence.

original: rnam pa gsum po 'di kho nar /
analyzed: rnam pa gsum po 'di kho nar /
translated: There are only three kinds of reasons.

original: med na mi 'byung nges phyir ro //üîΩphyogs kyi chos kyi khyab pa ji skad du /
analyzed: med na mi 'byung nges phyir ro // phyogs kyi chos kyi khyab pa ji skad du /
translated: Because they are ascertained as being inseparable.

original: bshad pa ni med na mi 'byung ba yin te /
analyzed: bshad pa ni med na mi 'byung ba yin te /
translated: The pervasion of the property of the subject, as it was explained, is inseparability.

original: de ni gtan tshigs rnam pa gsum las med pas 'di nyid du nges pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni gtan tshigs rnam pa gsum las med pas 'di nyid du nges pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Since there are no reasons other than these three kinds, it is said that they are ascertained as being just these.

original: de la sgrub pa'i chos kyi ngo bo tsam dang ldan @240b pa can ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin no //
analyzed: de la sgrub pa'i chos kyi ngo bo tsam dang ldan @240b pa can ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin no //
translated: In that regard, a reason from identity is a reason that possesses the mere nature of the property to be established.

original: phan tshun ldog pa'i bye brag gis chos tha dad pa yin yang /
analyzed: phan tshun ldog pa'i bye brag gis chos tha dad pa yin yang /
translated: Although they are different things because of their mutual exclusion,

analyzed: dngos su na gtan tshigs ni rtags can gyi rang bzhin kho na yin no //
translated: in reality, the reason is only the nature of the property-possessor.

analyzed: rang bzhin la rjes su 'gro ba 'khrul pa med pa las mtshan nyid la gzhan gyi lugs la ltos nas /
translated: From the unmistaken pervasion of the nature, in dependence on the other system,

analyzed: de tsam dang ldan pa can gyis khyad par du byas so //
translated: it is distinguished by possessing just that.

original: gzhan dag ni don gzhan gyi rgyu mtshan can de'i ngo bo tsam dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i chos kyang rang bzhin du 'dod pas /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni don gzhan gyi rgyu mtshan can de'i ngo bo tsam dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i chos kyang rang bzhin du 'dod pas /
translated: Others assert that a property that does not possess the mere nature of a different object's reason is a nature.

original: khyad par gyis de lta bu rang bzhin ma yin pa nyid dang / bsgrub par bya ba de la gtan tshigs 'khrul par bstan de /
analyzed: khyad par gyis de lta bu rang bzhin ma yin pa nyid dang / bsgrub par bya ba de la gtan tshigs 'khrul par bstan de /
translated: Therefore, the distinction is that such is not a nature, and the reason is shown to be mistaken with respect to the probandum.

original: dper na 'jig pa rgyu dang ldan pa la byas pa lta bu'o //üîΩde'i sbyor ba ni rnam par gnyis te /
analyzed: dper na 'jig pa rgyu dang ldan pa la byas pa lta bu'o // de'i sbyor ba ni rnam par gnyis te /

analyzed: chos mthun pa nyid can dang // chos mi mthun pa can gnyis kyis so //

translated: For example, whatever exists is momentary.

translated: Or, if there were no momentariness, there would be no existence.

analyzed: sgra ni yod pas zhes bya ba lta bu ste / rjes su 'gro ba'am / ldog pas thams cad nye bar bsdus nas /
translated: Sound exists, therefore, it is momentary.üîΩEither by positive concomitance or by negative concomitance, all are included.

original: khyab pa rab tu ston pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis chos mthun pa can dang / chos mi mthun pa can gyi sbyor ba dag yin no //
analyzed: khyab pa rab tu ston pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis chos mthun pa can dang / chos mi mthun pa can gyi sbyor ba dag yin no //

analyzed: 'dir ni shugs kho nas dam bcas pa'i don rtogs pa'i phyir dam bcas pa'i sbyor ba mi bya'o //
translated: Here, since the meaning of the proposition is understood only by implication, the proposition is not stated.

original: gal te gzhal bya'i don rab tu ma bstan na /
analyzed: gal te gzhal bya'i don rab tu ma bstan na /
translated: If the meaning of the object to be established is not demonstrated,

original: de ci ltar rtogs she na /
analyzed: de ci ltar rtogs she na /
translated: how is it understood?

original: bdag nyid kyis rtogs pa la gzhan bya nye bar ston par byed pa su zhig yod de /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis rtogs pa la gzhan bya nye bar ston par byed pa su zhig yod de /

analyzed: phyogs na yod pa'i du ba nye bar dmigs pas de la mes khyab pa dran na /
translated: When one recalls the pervasion of fire by smoke, which is observed nearby,üîΩ

analyzed: de'i mthu kho nas 'di na me yod do snyam du shes so //

analyzed: de na 'di la 'ga' yang 'di na me yod do zhes ston par yang mi byed la /

analyzed: bdag nyid kyis kyang cung zad kyang mi rtogs te /
translated: and one does not understand anything by oneself.

original: tshad ma ma rtogs par de ltar rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad ma ma rtogs par de ltar rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no reason for understanding in that way without understanding the means of valid knowledge.

original: rtogs na ni rtogs don med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtogs na ni rtogs don med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If one did understand, then understanding would be pointless.

original: bdag nyid kyis bab col du 'di na me yod do snyam du @241a * //üîΩgzhal bya rnam par bzhag nas /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis bab col du 'di na me yod do snyam du @241a * // gzhal bya rnam par bzhag nas /
translated: Having rashly evaluated that there is fire here by oneself,

original: phyis de rab tu sgrub pa'i yan lag gi rjes su 'brang ngo snyam na /
analyzed: phyis de rab tu sgrub pa'i yan lag gi rjes su 'brang ngo snyam na /
translated: one later follows the branches that establish that.

original: rtogs pa'i rim pa 'di ni ci zhig yin /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i rim pa 'di ni ci zhig yin /
translated: What is this process of understanding?

original: de gzhan gyis brjod na yang dgos pa med pa'i phyir cha chung ngo //
analyzed: de gzhan gyis brjod na yang dgos pa med pa'i phyir cha chung ngo //
translated: If it is stated by another, it is of little consequence, because it is pointless.

original: gal te dgos pa yul bstan pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te dgos pa yul bstan pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If the purpose is the teaching of the object,

original: re zhig bstan pa de nyid kyis ci zhig phan /
analyzed: re zhig bstan pa de nyid kyis ci zhig phan /
translated: What good is that teaching to you?

original: gal te gzhan du na rtogs par mi 'gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te gzhan du na rtogs par mi 'gyur na ni /
translated: If you do not understand it in any other way,

original: thams cad legs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad legs par 'gyur ro //
translated: then everything is fine.

original: de lta bas na 'dis bdag nyid kyis rtogs pa na /
analyzed: de lta bas na 'dis bdag nyid kyis rtogs pa na /
translated: Therefore, when you understand it yourself,

original: yul nye bar 'god pa 'ga' yang med par rtogs la /
analyzed: yul nye bar 'god pa 'ga' yang med par rtogs la /
translated: you understand it without positing any object.

original: kho bo don du gnyer ba mthong nas /
analyzed: kho bo don du gnyer ba mthong nas /
translated: Seeing that we are interested in it,

original: dus ston gyi bram ze bzhin du /
analyzed: dus ston gyi bram ze bzhin du /
translated: like a brahmin at a festival,

original: gsal bar rngan pa sgugs par byed pa yin no //üîΩkho bos brjod kyang bdag nyid grub zin pa'i rtags kho na'i rjes su 'brangs na rtogs par 'gyur bas gnas skabs 'di gnyis la khyad par ci zhig yod /
analyzed: gsal bar rngan pa sgugs par byed pa yin no // kho bos brjod kyang bdag nyid grub zin pa'i rtags kho na'i rjes su 'brangs na rtogs par 'gyur bas gnas skabs 'di gnyis la khyad par ci zhig yod /
translated: you make us wait for the reward.üîΩBut if we understand it by following the evidence of the proof that you yourself have already established, then what is the difference between the two situations?

original: dam bca' ba smos pa med par yang phyogs kyi chos dang 'brel pa smos pa tsam gyis rtogs pa yang mthong ba'i phyir de dgos pa ci zhig yod /
analyzed: dam bca' ba smos pa med par yang phyogs kyi chos dang 'brel pa smos pa tsam gyis rtogs pa yang mthong ba'i phyir de dgos pa ci zhig yod /
translated: And since we see that one can understand the connection between the subject and reason merely by stating the latter, what is the point of stating the thesis?

analyzed: rang la nges pa bzhin du gzhan dag la nges pa bskyed par 'dod pa'i phyir sgrub pa zhes bya'o //

original: de la 'di dag nyid kyis gzhal bya nye bar bstan pa med par yang rtogs la /
analyzed: de la 'di dag nyid kyis gzhal bya nye bar bstan pa med par yang rtogs la /
translated: In this regard, it is not the case that the object to be inferred is presented without being understood.

original: gzhan khong du chud par byed pa na /
analyzed: gzhan khong du chud par byed pa na /
translated: When one causes others to understand,

original: don gyi rim pa sngon ma byung ba ma bstan to zhes bya ba 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod /
analyzed: don gyi rim pa sngon ma byung ba ma bstan to zhes bya ba 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod /
translated: what is the reason for not teaching the sequence of the meaning that has not occurred before?

original: de lta bas na gzhan du na yang rtogs pa skye ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta bas na gzhan du na yang rtogs pa skye ba'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, since understanding arises even in other ways,

original: gzhal bya smos pa ni cung zad kyang kyang mi dgos so //
analyzed: gzhal bya smos pa ni cung zad kyang kyang mi dgos so //
translated: the mention of the object to be inferred is not necessary at all.

original: 'dis ni nye bar gtod pa dang / mjug sdud pa la sogs pa yang spangs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dis ni nye bar gtod pa dang / mjug sdud pa la sogs pa yang spangs pa yin te /
translated: By this, the introduction, conclusion, and so on are also rejected,

original: sbyor ba 'di tsam kho nas rtogs par btub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sbyor ba 'di tsam kho nas rtogs par btub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because understanding is possible by this much of an application.

original: re zhig kha bya'i chags pa yongs su bor la mig tshums te /
analyzed: re zhig kha bya'i chags pa yongs su bor la mig tshums te /
translated: First, cast aside the attachment to the words and close your eyes.

original: ci 'di tsam gyis rtogs par btub bam /
analyzed: ci 'di tsam gyis rtogs par btub bam /
translated: Is it possible to understand this much?

original: 'on te mi btub ces soms shig / btub pa ltar na ni spros pa'i phreng pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: 'on te mi btub ces soms shig / btub pa ltar na ni spros pa'i phreng pas ci zhig bya /
translated: If you can, then what is the use of a series of elaborations?

analyzed: sgrub pa'i tshig la sbyor ba 'di tsam kho na zhig sbyar bar bya'o //

analyzed: 'di la yang phyogs kyi chos dang 'brel pa smos pa dag gi rim pa nges pa ni 'ga' yang med de ji ltar yang rtogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And in this case, there is no fixed order in the statement of the property of the subject and the relation, because it is understood in any order.

analyzed: @241b 'brel pa smos pa la yang sbyor ba 'ba' zhig tha dad par zad de /

analyzed: gnyi ga ltar yang chos tha dad kyang de'i ngo bo kho na ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In both cases, although the properties are different, they show the nature of that.

original: de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa yod na gzhan yod par nges pa med de /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa yod na gzhan yod par nges pa med de /
translated: If something is not its nature, then it is not certain that the other exists.

original: byas pa nyid yod na brtsal nas 'byung ba'i chos nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: byas pa nyid yod na brtsal nas 'byung ba'i chos nyid bzhin no //
translated: For example, if something is produced, it is a property that arises from effort.

original: de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa log na yang 'bras bu ma yin pa de ldog pa med de /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa log na yang 'bras bu ma yin pa de ldog pa med de /
translated: Even if something that is not its nature is eliminated, the non-effect is not eliminated.

original: dper na chos 'di gnyis kho na bzlog pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na chos 'di gnyis kho na bzlog pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, only these two properties are eliminated.

original: de lta bas na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las mtshan nyid ji lta ba gcig rab tu sbyar bas kyang gnyis pa 'phen pas sgrub pa'i tshig gcig la gnyi ga sbyor bar mi 'dod de /

translated: Therefore, we do not accept that the application of one characteristic, either the forward or the reverse pervasion, implies the application of the other in a proof statement,

analyzed: don med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that would be meaningless.

analyzed: de'i rang bzhin yin pa nyid kyis rjes su 'gro ba grub na /

analyzed: de med na med pa grub na de'i rjes su 'gro ba grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If the counter pervasion is established, then the forward pervasion is established because it is the nature of the reason.

original: ldog pa sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: ldog pa sbyor ba ni /
translated: The application of the counter pervasion

translated: Those different potencies of the causes are only momentary.

original: bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin so so'i khyad par can gyi 'bras bu skyed par nus pa chod pa med pa nyid du nye bar gnas pa ni tshogs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid gnas pa'i gzhi dag yin zhes bya ste /
analyzed: bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin so so'i khyad par can gyi 'bras bu skyed par nus pa chod pa med pa nyid du nye bar gnas pa ni tshogs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid gnas pa'i gzhi dag yin zhes bya ste /
translated: The collection of conditions that are not obstructed from producing their own individual effects are the basis of the nature of the effect of the collection.

original: 'di ltar de ni de mtha' dag las dmigs pa'i bdag nyid dang / gzugs 'dzin par so sor nges pa dang / yul dang ngo bo can zhes bya ba so so'i khyad par can gyi ngo bo nyid gcig skyes so //üîΩgal te nus pa 'gog pa med pa 'bras bu mjug thogs pa skad cig pa khyad par du bogs dbyung du med pa dag gi rkyen rnams la /
analyzed: 'di ltar de ni de mtha' dag las dmigs pa'i bdag nyid dang / gzugs 'dzin par so sor nges pa dang / yul dang ngo bo can zhes bya ba so so'i khyad par can gyi ngo bo nyid gcig skyes so // gal te nus pa 'gog pa med pa 'bras bu mjug thogs pa skad cig pa khyad par du bogs dbyung du med pa dag gi rkyen rnams la /
translated: Thus, the collection is the cause of the effect that is the nature of the collection, because the effect arises from the collection as a single entity that has the nature of the collection, the nature of the collection of all those conditions, the nature of the individual ascertainment of the apprehension of form, and the nature of the object.

original: phan tshun lhan cig byed pa'i don ci zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: phan tshun lhan cig byed pa'i don ci zhig yin zhe na /
translated: If the unobstructed potential is the effect that immediately follows the condition, and if it is momentary and cannot be enhanced, what is the purpose of the mutual cooperation of the conditions?

original: lhan cig byed pa ni thams cad du bogs 'byin pa skyed pa 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa ni thams cad du bogs 'byin pa skyed pa 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin no //
translated: Cooperation is not just the enhancement of the production of all things.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What is it then?

original: mang po dag don gcig byed pa gang yin pa yin te /
analyzed: mang po dag don gcig byed pa gang yin pa yin te /
translated: It is that which causes many things to produce a single effect,

original: dper na tshogs tha ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na tshogs tha ma lta bu'o //
translated: like the final moment of the collection.

original: 'di nyid dngos su lhan cig byed pa rnams kyi lhan cig byed pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di nyid dngos su lhan cig byed pa rnams kyi lhan cig byed pa yin te /
translated: This is the direct cooperative cause of the cooperative causes,

original: tha ma de nyid rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha ma de nyid rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that final moment is the cause.

original: skad cig ma de la ngo bo nyid gcig la dbye ba med pas khyad par du bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: skad cig ma de la ngo bo nyid gcig la dbye ba med pas khyad par du bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because in that moment, a single nature is undifferentiated, it cannot be distinguished.

original: khyad par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ni /
analyzed: khyad par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ni /
translated: The definition of the arising of a distinction is

original: ngo bo nyid gzhan 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid gzhan 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: the arising of a different nature.

original: ngo bo nyid gzhan 'byung na ni tha mar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid gzhan 'byung na ni tha mar mi 'gyur te /
translated: If a different nature arises, it would not be the final moment,

original: de'i phyir mngon sum gyi rgyur mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon sum gyi rgyur mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and therefore it would not be the cause of the direct perception.

original: de lta bas na lhan cig byed pa rnams las rgyu'i khyad par 'byung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na lhan cig byed pa rnams las rgyu'i khyad par 'byung ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, a distinction of cause does not arise from the cooperative causes.

original: gang dag la sngon dang phyis dang tha dad pa'i ngo bo med pa /
analyzed: gang dag la sngon dang phyis dang tha dad pa'i ngo bo med pa /
translated: Those that do not have a prior or subsequent different nature

original: gang gi mjug thogs su 'bras bu 'byung ba'i rkyen tha ma ngo bo nyid kyis nus par skad cig pa de dag lhan cig skye ste /
analyzed: gang gi mjug thogs su 'bras bu 'byung ba'i rkyen tha ma ngo bo nyid kyis nus par skad cig pa de dag lhan cig skye ste /
translated: The last condition, which is the one immediately antecedent to the effect, is the one that has the inherent power to produce the effect.

original: de la bya ba gcig pa kho na lhan cig byed pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de la bya ba gcig pa kho na lhan cig byed pa nyid yin no //
translated: The simultaneity of these moments is due to the fact that they have the same activity.

original: gal te nus pa de dag ga las byung zhe na /
analyzed: gal te nus pa de dag ga las byung zhe na /
translated: If you ask, ‚ÄúWhere do these powers come from?‚Äù

original: rang gi ngag las so //
analyzed: rang gi ngag las so //
translated: [we reply:] from their own words.

original: gal te de dag gis 'di rkyen gzhan dang nye ba med pa kho nar ci ste mi skyed de res 'ga' gzhan du yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te de dag gis 'di rkyen gzhan dang nye ba med pa kho nar ci ste mi skyed de res 'ga' gzhan du yang 'gyur ro //
translated: If you ask, ‚ÄúWhy don‚Äôt they produce the effect when they are not in the presence of other conditions?,‚Äù [we reply:] sometimes they do.

original: de'i phyir la lar gcig pus kyang skye bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir la lar gcig pus kyang skye bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Therefore, sometimes even a single one of them produces the effect.

original: 'du byed rgyu ma gzhan dang gzhan gyi rkyen dang ldan pas /
analyzed: 'du byed rgyu ma gzhan dang gzhan gyi rkyen dang ldan pas /
translated: Since the conditions of the other causes and effects are different,üîΩeach moment has a different power.

original: skad cig ma re re la nus pa tha dad pa can dag 'ga' zhig gis mtshungs pas ngo bo 'dra bar shes mod kyi /üîΩde @244a * //
analyzed: skad cig ma re re la nus pa tha dad pa can dag 'ga' zhig gis mtshungs pas ngo bo 'dra bar shes mod kyi / de @244a * //
translated: But since they are similar in some respects, they are recognized as having a similar nature.

original: la 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid tha dad pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: la 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid tha dad pa kho na yin te /
translated: However, their natures are different.

original: des na 'ga' zhig kho na 'ga' zhig gi rgyu yin no //
analyzed: des na 'ga' zhig kho na 'ga' zhig gi rgyu yin no //
translated: Therefore, some of them are the causes of some of them.

original: de la gzugs dang dbang po la sogs pa'i tshogs yul chod pa med pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa can gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de la gzugs dang dbang po la sogs pa'i tshogs yul chod pa med pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa can gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which possesses the collection of form, faculties, etc., which is not obstructed with regard to objects, etc.,

original: rnam par shes pa skyed par nus pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa skyed par nus pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: is the cause that is able to generate consciousness.

original: de dag phan tshun nye bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'i rten rkyen gyi khyad par gang yin pa de ni de'i rgyu skyed par nus pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag phan tshun nye bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'i rten rkyen gyi khyad par gang yin pa de ni de'i rgyu skyed par nus pa yin no //
translated: That which is the special condition for their mutual approach, etc., is the cause that is able to generate that.

original: de dag kyang sngon yang med /
analyzed: de dag kyang sngon yang med /
translated: They do not exist previously,

original: phyis kyang med /
analyzed: phyis kyang med /
translated: nor do they exist subsequently,

original: so so na yang med pas nus kyang sngon dang phyis kyang so so na yod pa las 'byung ba'i nyes pa dag gis mi gos so //
analyzed: so so na yang med pas nus kyang sngon dang phyis kyang so so na yod pa las 'byung ba'i nyes pa dag gis mi gos so //
translated: nor do they exist separately. Therefore, even though they are able, they are not tainted by the faults that arise from their existence previously, subsequently, or separately.

original: de dag na 'di dag phan tshun nye bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de nus pa'i rgyu yin pas /
analyzed: de dag na 'di dag phan tshun nye bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de nus pa'i rgyu yin pas /
translated: They say: That which is the cause of their mutual approach, etc., is the cause that is able.

original: de la nam yang gzhan du 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: de la nam yang gzhan du 'gyur ba med do //
translated: Therefore, they never become different.

original: tshul 'dis thams cad la rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo so sor nges pa khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: tshul 'dis thams cad la rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo so sor nges pa khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: By this method, one should understand the individual determination of the nature of cause and effect in all cases.

original: dngos po'i nus pa skad cig ma re re la ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan gyi rjes su 'gro ba can dag la yin gyi dngos po bstan pa gcig pu'i ngo bo nyid can dag la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po'i nus pa skad cig ma re re la ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan gyi rjes su 'gro ba can dag la yin gyi dngos po bstan pa gcig pu'i ngo bo nyid can dag la ni ma yin te /
translated: It is in the case of the momentary power of a thing that is followed by other and other specific entities, not in the case of a thing that has a single essential nature.

original: ngo bo nyid gzhan du 'gyur ba med pas nus pa dang mi nus pa'i ngo bo nyid dag la byed pa dang mi byed pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid gzhan du 'gyur ba med pas nus pa dang mi nus pa'i ngo bo nyid dag la byed pa dang mi byed pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not possible for that which is able and that which is unable to function, since there is no transformation of an essential nature.

original: gal te lhan cig byed kyi 'ga' zhig ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te lhan cig byed kyi 'ga' zhig ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is a certain one among the co-operating causes,

original: ci 'ba' zhig gis 'bras bu bskyed par nus sam /
analyzed: ci 'ba' zhig gis 'bras bu bskyed par nus sam /
translated: is it able to generate the effect by itself?

original: mi nus so //
analyzed: mi nus so //
translated: It is not.

original: ci'i phyir mi bskyed /
analyzed: ci'i phyir mi bskyed /
translated: Why does it not generate it?

original: mi bskyed na ji ltar nus /
analyzed: mi bskyed na ji ltar nus /
translated: If it does not generate it, how is it able?

original: gal te tha ga la sogs pa ras yug la sogs pa bya bar nus mod kyi /
analyzed: gal te tha ga la sogs pa ras yug la sogs pa bya bar nus mod kyi /
translated: If you say that a weaver, etc. is able to make cloth, etc.

original: thams cad du ni mi byed do zhe na /
analyzed: thams cad du ni mi byed do zhe na /
translated: but does not do so everywhere,

original: brtse ba'i dang tshul can blun po rnams dga' ba skyed de bar bskyed pa ni byas shing byas pa la yang dang yang byed du gzhug ste /
analyzed: brtse ba'i dang tshul can blun po rnams dga' ba skyed de bar bskyed pa ni byas shing byas pa la yang dang yang byed du gzhug ste /
translated: The fool, who is full of affection, is delighted by the production of the effect, and he causes it to be produced again and again.

original: 'di ltar 'di ni sa bon la sogs pa nye bar 'god par dpyad zin to //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di ni sa bon la sogs pa nye bar 'god par dpyad zin to //
translated: Thus, the seed, etc., have been analyzed as being the cause of the effect.

original: de lta bas na ngo bo nyid gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta bas na ngo bo nyid gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, because there is no transformation of an intrinsic nature,

original: de'i chos can gyi ngo bo nyid de lta bu ni tha ma'i gnas skabs bzhin du bzlog tu mi rung ngo //
analyzed: de'i chos can gyi ngo bo nyid de lta bu ni tha ma'i gnas skabs bzhin du bzlog tu mi rung ngo //
translated: the intrinsic nature of the entity that has that intrinsic nature cannot be reversed, just as it was at the end.

original: tha ma'i gnas skabs na sngon nus pa med pa las nus pa skye na /
analyzed: tha ma'i gnas skabs na sngon nus pa med pa las nus pa skye na /
translated: If, at the end, potency arises from what was previously non-potent,

original: nus pa de'i ngo bo nyid yin na ni /
analyzed: nus pa de'i ngo bo nyid yin na ni /
translated: if it has the intrinsic nature of potency,

original: sngon med pa skye ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: sngon med pa skye ba kho na yin no //
translated: it is only the arising of what did not previously exist.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin na ni byed pa po ma yin pa nyid de /
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin na ni byed pa po ma yin pa nyid de /
translated: If it does not have that intrinsic nature, it is not a producer,

original: nus pa zhes bya ba'i dngos po las 'bras bu skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nus pa zhes bya ba'i dngos po las 'bras bu skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the effect arises from a thing called potency.

original: gzhan yang re zhig de nyid lhan cig byed pa mtha' @244b dag dang ldan pa 'bras bu ji ste skyed /
analyzed: gzhan yang re zhig de nyid lhan cig byed pa mtha' @244b dag dang ldan pa 'bras bu ji ste skyed /
translated: Moreover, how could that which is endowed with all the conditions together generate an effect?

original: bskyed pa mthong ste /
analyzed: bskyed pa mthong ste /
translated: Because we see that it generates an effect.

original: des na bskyed do zhes smra'o //
analyzed: des na bskyed do zhes smra'o //
translated: Therefore, we say that it generates an effect.

original: mthu chen po can gyi mthong ba dngos po de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa dag kyang /
analyzed: mthu chen po can gyi mthong ba dngos po de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa dag kyang /
translated: Even though the seeing of those with great power is not the intrinsic reality of that thing,

original: rang gi ngo bo tsam gyis bya ba sna tshogs pa rnams la sbyor ba ni nus pa chen po can yin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo tsam gyis bya ba sna tshogs pa rnams la sbyor ba ni nus pa chen po can yin no //
translated: they are powerful because they are engaged in various actions by their mere intrinsic reality.

original: brgya zhig la 'ga' zhig ji zhig ltar 'dir khyod kyi mthong ba'i lam las 'das na /
analyzed: brgya zhig la 'ga' zhig ji zhig ltar 'dir khyod kyi mthong ba'i lam las 'das na /
translated: If by some chance something somehow transcends your path of seeing,

original: kye ma mi skyed pa'i chos can yin te /
analyzed: kye ma mi skyed pa'i chos can yin te /
translated: alas, it would be a non-generative phenomenon.

original: rgyu med pa can du 'gyur bas bsam pa 'di ni sems la gdung ngo //
analyzed: rgyu med pa can du 'gyur bas bsam pa 'di ni sems la gdung ngo //
translated: Since it would be causeless, this thought torments the mind.

original: kho bo ni de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa las bdag gis mthong bas 'bras bu bskyed do zhes mi zer ro //
analyzed: kho bo ni de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa las bdag gis mthong bas 'bras bu bskyed do zhes mi zer ro //
translated: We do not say that which is not its intrinsic reality generates an effect because we see it.

original: 'o na ci zhe na de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis de skyed pa'i chos can yin la /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis de skyed pa'i chos can yin la /
translated: Then what do we say? We say that by its intrinsic reality it is a phenomenon that generates an effect.

original: de dag mthong na 'di dag ni skyed pa po yin no zhes bya bar shes par zad do //
analyzed: de dag mthong na 'di dag ni skyed pa po yin no zhes bya bar shes par zad do //
translated: If you see them, you would know that they are the producers.

original: 'di yang yod par bden na de dag 'bras bu bskyed pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa des na /
analyzed: 'di yang yod par bden na de dag 'bras bu bskyed pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa des na /
translated: If they really exist, then because of the nature of their being producers of effects,

original: rkyen mtha' dag dang ldan pa rnams ma bskyed par btang snyoms su 'khod do zhes bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rkyen mtha' dag dang ldan pa rnams ma bskyed par btang snyoms su 'khod do zhes bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: it is not the case that they are indifferent and do not produce effects when they are endowed with all the conditions.

original: ci de dag gi mi sdod par bskyed pa'i chos can gyi ngo bo nyid de /
analyzed: ci de dag gi mi sdod par bskyed pa'i chos can gyi ngo bo nyid de /
translated: Do they have the nature of being producers of effects that do not endure,

original: tha ma'i gnas skabs de kho na'i tshe 'byung ngam /
analyzed: tha ma'i gnas skabs de kho na'i tshe 'byung ngam /
translated: or do they exist even earlier?

original: 'on te sngon yang yod de ma nyams ma byung ba brtan pa gcig pu'i ngo bo nyid can rnams la ngo bo nyid 'ga' med ba 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'on te sngon yang yod de ma nyams ma byung ba brtan pa gcig pu'i ngo bo nyid can rnams la ngo bo nyid 'ga' med ba 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If they are not destroyed and do not arise, it is contradictory to say that they have the nature of being permanent and singular.

original: de ni ci de ma yang yin mo gsham yang yin nam /
analyzed: de ni ci de ma yang yin mo gsham yang yin nam /
translated: What is the meaning of the statement, ‚ÄúThey are mothers and also barren women,

original: mi sdod par skyed pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyang yin la /
analyzed: mi sdod par skyed pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyang yin la /
translated: and they have the nature of being producers of effects that do not endure,

original: mi skyed pa yang yin no zhes smras pa 'di'i don ci yin /
analyzed: mi skyed pa yang yin no zhes smras pa 'di'i don ci yin /
translated: and they do not produce effects‚Äù?

original: gal te de'i ngo bo ni lhan cig pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te de'i ngo bo ni lhan cig pa yin gyi /
translated: If you say that its nature is to be simultaneous,

original: 'ba' zhig ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'ba' zhig ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: but not to be alone,

original: 'o na ni 'ba' zhig kyang gzhan la lhan cig pa yang gzhan yin te /
analyzed: 'o na ni 'ba' zhig kyang gzhan la lhan cig pa yang gzhan yin te /
translated: then being alone is one thing and being simultaneous is another.

original: dngos po tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid ni /
analyzed: dngos po tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid ni /
translated: The definition of a different thing is

original: ngo bo nyid tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: that it has a different nature.

original: lhan cig pa nyid yin yang gzhan gyi ngo bos byed pa po ni ma yin la /
analyzed: lhan cig pa nyid yin yang gzhan gyi ngo bos byed pa po ni ma yin la /
translated: Even if it is simultaneous, it is not a creator by virtue of another nature.

original: 'di'i rang gi ngo bo ni sngon yang de kho nar zad na /
analyzed: 'di'i rang gi ngo bo ni sngon yang de kho nar zad na /
translated: And if its nature is just that, then

original: ji ltar res 'ga' skyed pa dang 'bral /
analyzed: ji ltar res 'ga' skyed pa dang 'bral /
translated: how is it sometimes separated from creation?

original: gang gi dngos po skad cig pa yin pa de'i ltar na yang ji ste 'ba' zhig gis mi skyed /
analyzed: gang gi dngos po skad cig pa yin pa de'i ltar na yang ji ste 'ba' zhig gis mi skyed /
translated: If it is momentary, then how is it that it does not create alone?

original: gal te yin na ni skyed pa kho na'o //
analyzed: gal te yin na ni skyed pa kho na'o //
translated: If it does, then it creates only that.

original: ma yin na skad cig ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin na skad cig ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it does not, then it is momentary.

original: ji lta bu zhig bskyed pa ni bshad zin te /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhig bskyed pa ni bshad zin te /
translated: What is created has already been explained.

original: skad cig ma 'byung ba can de ji ltar gzhan du 'gyur /
analyzed: skad cig ma 'byung ba can de ji ltar gzhan du 'gyur /
translated: How can that which has momentary arising be different?

original: gang zhig 'gyur ba de ni de nyid @245a * //
analyzed: gang zhig 'gyur ba de ni de nyid @245a * //
translated: That which is different is not that.

original: ma yin pas thal ba 'dir mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ma yin pas thal ba 'dir mi 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, this reductio does not apply.

original: byed pa po dang / byed pa po ma yin pa dag gi ngo bo nyid dang de'i rgyu dag 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa po dang / byed pa po ma yin pa dag gi ngo bo nyid dang de'i rgyu dag 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the nature of the agent and non-agent and their causes are contradictory.

original: gang zhig de'i ngo bo nyid de ni mi sdod par skye ba'i chos can kho na yin pas /
analyzed: gang zhig de'i ngo bo nyid de ni mi sdod par skye ba'i chos can kho na yin pas /
translated: That which is its nature is only a phenomenon that arises without abiding.

original: de ni lhan cig pa nyid la mi ltos so //
analyzed: de ni lhan cig pa nyid la mi ltos so //
translated: Therefore, it does not depend on simultaneity.

original: 'bras bu ni rkyen gzhan la ltos pas /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni rkyen gzhan la ltos pas /
translated: But the effect depends on other conditions.

original: lhan cig pa kho na las spyi'i 'ba' zhig las ni ma yin no snyam du sems na /
analyzed: lhan cig pa kho na las spyi'i 'ba' zhig las ni ma yin no snyam du sems na /
translated: Therefore, it is only from a simultaneous cause that it arises, not from a cause that is not simultaneous.

original: de ltar na yang ci ltar de 'ba' zhig gis kyang skyed pa kho na yin la 'bras bu yang de las mi skye zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar na yang ci ltar de 'ba' zhig gis kyang skyed pa kho na yin la 'bras bu yang de las mi skye zhes bya ste /
translated: But in that case, how could it be that only that which is simultaneous generates it, but the effect does not arise from that?

original: gnas skabs de ni 'gal lo //
analyzed: gnas skabs de ni 'gal lo //
translated: That state is contradictory.

original: gal te 'ba' zhig gis skyed pa kho ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'ba' zhig gis skyed pa kho ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not only that which is simultaneous that generates it,

original: da ni ji ltar na mi 'dod par skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin te /
analyzed: da ni ji ltar na mi 'dod par skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin te /
translated: then how could it have the nature of generating that which is not desired?

original: 'di skad du skyed pa kho na'o zhes yongs su bstan pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'di skad du skyed pa kho na'o zhes yongs su bstan pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt it taught that it only generates that which is simultaneous?

original: 'di 'ba' zhig kyang nus pa yin na /

original: de lta na /
analyzed: de lta na /

original: thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thug pa med par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: gal te 'di'i ngo bo nyid de mi sdod par skyed par byed pa'i chos can zhig yin na ni /

translated: Therefore, from non-momentary causes,

translated: Nor is it that they assist through a continuum,

original: de'i lhan cig byed pa 'ga' yang med de /
analyzed: de'i lhan cig byed pa 'ga' yang med de /
translated: so there is no co-operative cause for that.

original: de'i phyir 'ba' zhig gis kyang bskyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'ba' zhig gis kyang bskyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it would be generated by the single cause alone.

original: dngos po'i rgyun tshogs pa la gnas pa can ni /
analyzed: dngos po'i rgyun tshogs pa la gnas pa can ni /
translated: The continuum of an entity that is present in the collection

original: sa bon la sogs pa bzhin no //

analyzed: gang zhig gzhan yin pa de ji ltar de'i yin te /

analyzed: 'dis ni zangs la sogs pa'i sra ba la sogs pa me la sogs pa las snyi ba la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid gzhan du 'gyur ba bsal ba yin te /

analyzed: de la yang snga ma rang gi ngang gis 'jig pa can yin pa'i phyir zhig na /

analyzed: me la sogs pa dang / nye bar len pa las snyi ba la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid gzhan kho na zhig 'byung ba yin no //

original: de ni rang gis gnas pa'i chos can kho na yin te /
analyzed: de ni rang gis gnas pa'i chos can kho na yin te /
translated: It is an entity that endures by itself,

original: 'jig pa'i rgyu mi srid na gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig pa'i rgyu mi srid na gnas pa'i phyir ro //

translated: because the mere transformation of the thing is called ‚Äúdestruction.‚Äù

original: las mi 'da'o //üîΩci dngos po ngo bo nyid kyis brtag pa zhig gam mi rtag pa zhig ces brtag par bya ba la /
analyzed: las mi 'da'o // ci dngos po ngo bo nyid kyis brtag pa zhig gam mi rtag pa zhig ces brtag par bya ba la /
translated: This response does not go beyond two alternatives.üîΩIs a thing to be analyzed as being either essentially permanent or essentially impermanent?

original: sngar rtag par gyur nas phyis mi rtag par 'gyur ro zhes smra na ni /
analyzed: sngar rtag par gyur nas phyis mi rtag par 'gyur ro zhes smra na ni /
translated: If you say that it is permanent and then becomes impermanent,

original: rtag par 'dod pa snga ma thams cad du rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i ngo bo nyid tha dad pa can gyi dngos po gnyis dang / rang gis 'jig pa dang / mi 'jig par rab tu smra ba yin te /
analyzed: rtag par 'dod pa snga ma thams cad du rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i ngo bo nyid tha dad pa can gyi dngos po gnyis dang / rang gis 'jig pa dang / mi 'jig par rab tu smra ba yin te /
translated: All of those who assert permanence assert that a thing has two natures, one permanent and one impermanent, and they assert that it is destroyed by itself and not destroyed.

original: de ltar na snga ma la 'jig pa'i rgyu nus pa med do //
analyzed: de ltar na snga ma la 'jig pa'i rgyu nus pa med do //
translated: Thus, the cause of destruction has no power over the former.

original: sngar rtag par gyur nas phyis mi rtag par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sngar rtag par gyur nas phyis mi rtag par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that it was permanent before and later becomes impermanent.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What is it then?

original: phyis kyang rtag pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: phyis kyang rtag pa kho na yin te /
translated: Later it is permanent.

original: ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it has a single nature.

original: 'o na dngos po de ngo bo nyid kyis 'jig pa dang ma 'brel na 'jig pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin te /
analyzed: 'o na dngos po de ngo bo nyid kyis 'jig pa dang ma 'brel na 'jig pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin te /

analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid dang 'jig pa dag ni phan tshun gyi ngo bo can ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because its nature and destruction do not have the nature of being mutually related.

original: de lta bas na 'di la 'jig pa yod pa dang / 'di 'jig pa'i ngo bo nyid du 'gyur dgos te /
analyzed: de lta bas na 'di la 'jig pa yod pa dang / 'di 'jig pa'i ngo bo nyid du 'gyur dgos te /
translated: Therefore, it must be that it has destruction and that it has the nature of destruction.

analyzed: de lta na yang 'jig pa'i rgyu don med do zhes bshad zin to // des na dngos po'i ngo bo nyid kyis 'jig pa yin yang rung /
translated: But we have already explained that the cause of destruction is pointless.

original: mi 'jig pa yin yang rung ste /
analyzed: mi 'jig pa yin yang rung ste /
translated: Therefore, whether the intrinsic reality of things is destroyed or not,

original: 'jig pa'i rgyu dgos pa med do //
analyzed: 'jig pa'i rgyu dgos pa med do //
translated: the cause of destruction is pointless.

original: de lta bas na dngos po 'jig pa la ltos pa med pas de'i ngo bor nges pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na dngos po 'jig pa la ltos pa med pas de'i ngo bor nges pa yin no //
translated: Thus, since things do not depend on destruction, their intrinsic reality is ascertained.

original: yod pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig pa yin la /
analyzed: yod pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig pa yin la /
translated: Whatever exists is destroyed.

original: 'jig pa log na yod pa ldog pas rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa grub pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig pa log na yod pa ldog pas rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa grub pa'o //
translated: If destruction is refuted, existence is refuted. Thus, the establishment of the pervasion is complete.

original: gal te ngo bo nyid kyis 'jig pa nyid yin na yang /
analyzed: gal te ngo bo nyid kyis 'jig pa nyid yin na yang /
translated: But if things are destroyed by their very nature,

original: la la de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin par yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: la la de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin par yang 'gyur te /
translated: then some things would not have that nature.

original: thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid thams cad yin pa ni med pas rjes su 'gro ba dang / ldog pa ma grub po zhe na /
analyzed: thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid thams cad yin pa ni med pas rjes su 'gro ba dang / ldog pa ma grub po zhe na /
translated: Since the intrinsic reality of all things does not exist, the establishment of the pervasion is incomplete.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: skad cig pa nyid ma yin na dngos po med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad cig pa nyid ma yin na dngos po med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because if things were not momentary, it would follow that they would not be impermanent.

original: dngos po'i mtshan nyid ni nus pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos po'i mtshan nyid ni nus pa yin no //
translated: The definition of an entity is that which is capable of effective action.

original: nus pa thams cad bral ba ni dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: nus pa thams cad bral ba ni dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: The definition of a nonentity is that which is not capable of effective action.

original: skad cig pa ma yin pa ni 'ga' yang gang du nus pa med de rim dang cig car dag gis don byed par 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad cig pa ma yin pa ni 'ga' yang gang du nus pa med de rim dang cig car dag gis don byed par 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: That which is not momentary is not capable of effective action anywhere, because it is contradictory for it to perform an action either gradually or instantaneously.

original: de lta bas na gang yod pa de ni skad cig pa kho na yin pas khyab pa grub bo //
analyzed: de lta bas na gang yod pa de ni skad cig pa kho na yin pas khyab pa grub bo //
translated: Therefore, whatever exists is only momentary. Thus the pervasion is established.

original: don gzhan shes par bya ba la 'bras bu gtan tshigs yin te 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don gzhan shes par bya ba la 'bras bu gtan tshigs yin te 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In the proof of a thing that is to be known as a different object, the effect is the reason because there is no error.

original: gal te rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po rtags shes par byed pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: gal te rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po rtags shes par byed pa nyid yin na /
translated: If the state of being cause and effect is the evidence that establishes the knowledge,

original: rnam pa thams cad du shes par bya @247b ba dang / shes par byed pa'i dngos po yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du shes par bya @247b ba dang / shes par byed pa'i dngos po yin te /
translated: then the state of being that which is to be known and that which knows is in all ways the evidence that establishes the knowledge.

original: rnam pa thams cad du bskyed par bya ba dang / skyed par byed pa'i dngos po yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du bskyed par bya ba dang / skyed par byed pa'i dngos po yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because the state of being that which is to be produced and that which produces is in all ways the evidence that establishes the knowledge.

original: ma yin te de med par 'byung ba ni de las 'byung ba nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te de med par 'byung ba ni de las 'byung ba nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because that which arises in the absence of that is not necessarily arisen from that.

original: de lta bas na rgyu'i ngo bo nyid ji snyed gcig med par 'bras bu mi 'byung ba de dag rgyu yin te /
analyzed: de lta bas na rgyu'i ngo bo nyid ji snyed gcig med par 'bras bu mi 'byung ba de dag rgyu yin te /
translated: Therefore, as many entities as are not arisen in the absence of a cause are its cause,

original: de'i 'bras bu nyid du nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu nyid du nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are ascertained as its effect.

original: gang dag de dag med na mi 'byung ba'i chos de dag nyid kyis so //
analyzed: gang dag de dag med na mi 'byung ba'i chos de dag nyid kyis so //
translated: Those very phenomena that do not arise in the absence of those are the cause.

original: gal te cha shas kyis bskyed par bya ba dang / skyed par byed pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te cha shas kyis bskyed par bya ba dang / skyed par byed pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If it is said that it follows that they are partially productive and partially not productive,

analyzed: ma yin te des bskyed par bya ba'i khyad par dang / rtags kyi khyad par gyi bye brag can gyi spyi rnams 'dzin na /
translated: no, because when they are apprehended as the specific product of that and as the specific evidence of that,

original: 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is accepted.

original: khyad par can ma yin pa'i spyi'i brjod par 'dod na /
analyzed: khyad par can ma yin pa'i spyi'i brjod par 'dod na /
translated: If it is said that it is not accepted that they are the expression of a nondistinctive universal,

original: 'khrul pa'i phyir mi 'dod do //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i phyir mi 'dod do //
translated: it is not accepted because of error.

original: gal te 'ga' zhig res 'ga' zhig las 'byung yang de dang 'dra ba thams cad de las skye'o zhes bya ba go ga las /
analyzed: gal te 'ga' zhig res 'ga' zhig las 'byung yang de dang 'dra ba thams cad de las skye'o zhes bya ba go ga las /
translated: If something arises from something else sometimes, then it is understood that everything arises from that.

original: de lta na rjes su 'gro ba dang / ldog pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na rjes su 'gro ba dang / ldog pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: In that case, there is no invariable concomitance and no reverse entailment.

original: ma yin te /üîΩde las 'byung ba can ma yin pa de ni /
analyzed: ma yin te / de las 'byung ba can ma yin pa de ni /
translated: That is not so.

original: lan 'ga' yang de las mi 'byung ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: lan 'ga' yang de las mi 'byung ba'i phyir te /
translated: That which does not arise from that does not arise from that even once.

original: phan tshun ltos pas bskyed par bya ba dang / skyed par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid can gyi 'bras bu dag yin no //
analyzed: phan tshun ltos pas bskyed par bya ba dang / skyed par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid can gyi 'bras bu dag yin no //
translated: Because they are mutually dependent, they are characterized as having the nature of a product and a producer.

analyzed: de la gal te du ba me la sogs pa'i tshogs pa las gzhan pa las kyang 'byung bar 'gyur na /
translated: If smoke arose from a collection of fire and so on, or from something else,

original: de ni des bskyed par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pas /
analyzed: de ni des bskyed par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pas /
translated: then it would not have the nature of being produced by that.

original: lan 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: lan 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /

original: don gzhan bzhin no //
analyzed: don gzhan bzhin no //

analyzed: tshogs pas kyang de skyed par mi 'gyur te /

original: ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it has a single nature.

original: du ba dang du ba ma yin pa bskyed pa'i ngo bo nyid las 'byung na ni /
analyzed: du ba dang du ba ma yin pa bskyed pa'i ngo bo nyid las 'byung na ni /

analyzed: du ba dang du ba ma yin pa'i ngo bo nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: then it would have the nature of both smoke and that which is not smoke,

analyzed: 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid rnams ni rgyu'i ngo bo nyid kyis byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the nature of the effect is made by the nature of the cause.

analyzed: rgyu la mi ltos na yang rgyu med pa nyid thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // de lta bas na du ba skyed par byed pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: And if it did not depend on the cause, it would follow that it would be without a cause.

analyzed: me la sogs pa'i tshogs pa'i khyad par yin la me la sogs pa'i tshogs pa'i khyad par gyis bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni du ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, that which produces smoke is a particular collection of fire and so on. That which is produced by a particular collection of fire and so on is smoke.

analyzed: de ltar na rgyu dang 'bras bu dag gi ngo bo nyid nges pa'i phyir rigs mi mthun pa las byung ba ma yin no /
translated: Thus, since the nature of cause and effect is ascertained, they do not arise from a dissimilar class.

original: de lta @248a * //
analyzed: de lta @248a * //
translated: Thus,

original: bas na 'bras bus rgyu 'khrul pa med do //
analyzed: bas na 'bras bus rgyu 'khrul pa med do //
translated: the effect is not mistaken for the cause.

original: des rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po grub na 'bras bu la rgyus khyab par grub pa yin no //
analyzed: des rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po grub na 'bras bu la rgyus khyab par grub pa yin no //
translated: When the existence of cause and effect is established in this way, the pervasion of the effect by the cause is established.

original: rigs mi mthun pa las kyang cung zad 'byung ba mthong ste /
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa las kyang cung zad 'byung ba mthong ste /
translated: But we see that something arises from a dissimilar class,

analyzed: dper na pa lang gi lci ba la sogs pa las sha la'u ka la sogs pa lta bu ma yin nam zhe na /

original: rigs mi mthun pa las 'byung ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa las 'byung ba ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not from a dissimilar class.

original: de lta bu kho na de 'dra ba'i dang po'i rgyu mtshan yin pas /
analyzed: de lta bu kho na de 'dra ba'i dang po'i rgyu mtshan yin pas /
translated: That very thing is the reason for the first thing of that same type,

original: rgyu tha dad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu tha dad pa ma yin no //

original: rgyun gyis 'byung na ni /
analyzed: rgyun gyis 'byung na ni /
translated: If it arises in a continuum,

original: 'dam bu las 'byung ngo //
analyzed: 'dam bu las 'byung ngo //

analyzed: dngos po rnams kyi rnam pa mtshungs pa kho na ni de nyid kyi rgyu ma yin te /

analyzed: rnam pa tha dad pa ma yin pa rnams kyang kha cig khyad par gzhan gyi sgo nas rigs tha dad pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because even those that are not different in aspect are seen to be different in kind in some cases.

original: de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin te /
translated: If it were not so,

analyzed: tshogs pa mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba las kyang mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba ma yin pa 'byung na ni /
translated: then even from a collection that is not different in characteristics, a result that is not different in characteristics would not arise.

original: rgyu'i tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa dag las 'bras bu'i tha dad pa dang / tha dad pa ma yin pa dag ma yin pas /
analyzed: rgyu'i tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa dag las 'bras bu'i tha dad pa dang / tha dad pa ma yin pa dag ma yin pas /
translated: Since the difference or non-difference of the result does not depend on the difference or non-difference of the cause,

original: thams cad kyi tha dad pa dang / tha dad pa ma yin pa dag rgyu med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: thams cad kyi tha dad pa dang / tha dad pa ma yin pa dag rgyu med par 'gyur te /
translated: the difference and non-difference of everything would be without a cause.

original: 'di ltar tha dad pa las tha dad pa ma yin pa las kyang tha dad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar tha dad pa las tha dad pa ma yin pa las kyang tha dad pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, difference would not arise from difference or from non-difference.

analyzed: de ma gtogs pa'i dngos po'i ngo bo nyid kyang 'ga' yang med pas /

analyzed: dngos po rnams rgyu med pa can ma yin pa'i phyir rtag tu yod pa'am /
translated: because things are not without a cause.

original: med pa zhig tu 'gyur te /
analyzed: med pa zhig tu 'gyur te /
translated: They would be either always existent or always nonexistent,

original: ltos par bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ltos par bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there would be nothing to depend on.

original: dngos po rnams ni ltos pa'i phyir res 'ga' ba yin no //
analyzed: dngos po rnams ni ltos pa'i phyir res 'ga' ba yin no //
translated: Things are sometimes existent because they depend on something else.

analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dag la sgrub pa nye bar sbyor ba rnam par gnas pa dang ldan par yang mi 'gyur te /
translated: And the application of a proof to a probandum would not be restricted,

original: rgyu'i nus pa so sor nges na 'ga' zhig 'ga' sgrub par byed par gzung gi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu'i nus pa so sor nges na 'ga' zhig 'ga' sgrub par byed par gzung gi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: because the power of a cause is restricted to the production of a particular thing, and not of something else.

original: de kho na de la nus pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: de kho na de la nus pa'i phyir la /
translated: Because the power of the cause is restricted to that,

original: gzhan ni mi nus pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gzhan ni mi nus pa'i phyir te /
translated: and not to the other,

original: de gnyis ni bskyed pa dang cig shos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gnyis ni bskyed pa dang cig shos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because those two are different in nature, one being produced and the other not.

original: de bskyed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba las kyang de 'byung na ni de bskyed par nus na nges pa med pas ci yang rung ste /
analyzed: de bskyed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba las kyang de 'byung na ni de bskyed par nus na nges pa med pas ci yang rung ste /

original: gang yang rung ba las 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang yang rung ba las 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It arises from any of them.

original: de bskyed nus par mtshungs na ni de nyid yin pas 'bras bu rgyu 'khrul pa ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: de bskyed nus par mtshungs na ni de nyid yin pas 'bras bu rgyu 'khrul pa ma mthong ngo //
translated: If they are equal in their ability to produce it, then it is just that. Therefore, the effect is not seen to be confused with the cause.

original: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa mi dmigs pa ni /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa mi dmigs pa ni /
translated: Non-apprehension of the perceptible

original: dngos po med @248b par tha snyad gdags pa'i gtan tshigs yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med @248b par tha snyad gdags pa'i gtan tshigs yin no //

analyzed: de la dmigs pa dmigs par byed pa'i chos nyin na ni /

original: de'i shes pa dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i shes pa dmigs pa yin no //

original: brjod par 'dod pa'i dmigs pa las gzhan yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa'i dmigs pa las gzhan yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is different from the object of apprehension that is desired to be expressed,

original: de las gzhan pa'i dmigs pa ni mi dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i dmigs pa ni mi dmigs pa yin te /
translated: the apprehension of something different from that is non-apprehension.

original: ma yin par 'jug pas bzar mi rung ba dang reg tu mi rung ba bzhin no //
analyzed: ma yin par 'jug pas bzar mi rung ba dang reg tu mi rung ba bzhin no //
translated: It is like the case of something unfit to be eaten or touched because it is engaged in something else.

original: dmigs par bya ba'i chos nyid yin na ni /
analyzed: dmigs par bya ba'i chos nyid yin na ni /
translated: If it is the nature of the object of apprehension,

original: dmigs pa yul gyi ngo bo nyid rang gi yul can gyi shes pa skyed par rung ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid can yin te /
analyzed: dmigs pa yul gyi ngo bo nyid rang gi yul can gyi shes pa skyed par rung ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid can yin te /

original: rung ba nyid ni dngos po'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rung ba nyid ni dngos po'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because suitability is the nature of an entity.

original: de las gzhan pa'i dmigs par rung pa kho na nyid mi dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i dmigs par rung pa kho na nyid mi dmigs pa ste /
translated: The non-apprehension of something else that is suitable to appear is the non-apprehension of just that.

original: snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin no //

original: rung pa nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rung pa nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because there is no difference in suitability.

original: gang du gang zhig dmigs na /
analyzed: gang du gang zhig dmigs na /

original: gang zhig nges par dmigs par 'gyur ba de ni de dang 'brel pa yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig nges par dmigs par 'gyur ba de ni de dang 'brel pa yin te /
translated: that is definitely related to it,

original: shes pa gcig dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa gcig dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is related to a single cognition.

original: de gnyis yod na ngo bo gcig nges par gtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de gnyis yod na ngo bo gcig nges par gtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: If those two exist, a single nature is not definitely included,

original: mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is impossible.

original: de lta bas na 'dir gzhan nyid ni rung ba nyid kyi ngo bo khyad par med pa can shes pa dang 'brel pa can dag phan tshun ltos pa kho na yin par 'dod do //
analyzed: de lta bas na 'dir gzhan nyid ni rung ba nyid kyi ngo bo khyad par med pa can shes pa dang 'brel pa can dag phan tshun ltos pa kho na yin par 'dod do //

analyzed: de 'ba' zhig de la ltos nas gzhan yin pas / de'i ngo bo nyid de shes par byed pa'am /

analyzed: shes par bya ba'i chos kyi mtshan nyid ni mi dmigs pa yin te /
translated: or the characteristic of an object that is to be understood is non-apprehension.üîΩThat is the non-existence of an opponent,

original: de ni zla bo dngos po med pa'am /
analyzed: de ni zla bo dngos po med pa'am /
translated: or the non-existence of a thing.

original: dngos po med par tha snyad gdags par sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med par tha snyad gdags par sgrub pa yin no //
translated: and it is established that the designation of non-entity is made.

original: ji ltar na gzhan yod pa de med pa yin /
analyzed: ji ltar na gzhan yod pa de med pa yin /
translated: How is the existence of the other the non-existence of that?

original: gang gis na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo'i mi dmigs pas dngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa sgrub par byed ce na /
analyzed: gang gis na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo'i mi dmigs pas dngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa sgrub par byed ce na /
translated: By what is the designation of non-entity established by the non-apprehension of the nature of non-entity?

original: 'dir ci ltar ma yin par 'jug pa la ltos pa'i sgo nas dngos po med pa dang mi dmigs pa dag mi dmigs pa yin par bshad zin te //
analyzed: 'dir ci ltar ma yin par 'jug pa la ltos pa'i sgo nas dngos po med pa dang mi dmigs pa dag mi dmigs pa yin par bshad zin te //
translated: Here, it has already been explained that non-entity and non-apprehension are non-apprehension in terms of dependence on engagement as it is not.

original: de sgrub par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de sgrub par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not established as the proof of that.

original: dngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa mi 'grub par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa mi 'grub par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that the designation of non-entity would not be established.

original: 'brel pa med pa'i ngo bo de yod par grub pa nyid gzhan med par grub pa yin pas /
analyzed: 'brel pa med pa'i ngo bo de yod par grub pa nyid gzhan med par grub pa yin pas /
translated: Since the establishment of the existence of that entity which is unrelated is the establishment of the non-existence of the other,

original: gzhan yod pa yang de med pa ma yin no zhes tha snyad gdags so //
analyzed: gzhan yod pa yang de med pa ma yin no zhes tha snyad gdags so //
translated: the existence of the other is designated as the non-existence of that.üîΩThe non-entity which is characterized by the existence of the other is established by one‚Äôs own valid cognition as non-existent,

original: gzhan yod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dngos po med par rang gi tshad mas 'grub pa'am /
analyzed: gzhan yod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dngos po med par rang gi tshad mas 'grub pa'am /
translated: The nonexistence of an object that has the character of being other is established by one‚Äôs own valid knowledge.
