analyzed: de grub pas de med par grub pa de dngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa sgrub par byed pa la khyad par 'ga' yang med na gang gis na mi dmigs pas dngos po med @249a * // par tha snyad gdags par 'grub pa 'gal bar 'gyur /
translated: If there is no difference between the establishment of the non-existence of that and the establishment of the designation of the non-existence of that as a non-thing, then why would the establishment of the designation of the non-existence of that as a non-thing be contradictory to the non-apprehension of that?

original: gzhan yod pa de nyid dang de'i yul can gyi shas pa dngos po med pa'i sgrub pa ci ste ma yin /
analyzed: gzhan yod pa de nyid dang de'i yul can gyi shas pa dngos po med pa'i sgrub pa ci ste ma yin /
translated: How could the existence of another and the cognition of that which has that as its object not be the establishment of a non-thing?

original: ci'i phyir gzhan yod par grub pa nyid de med par grub pa yin zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir gzhan yod par grub pa nyid de med par grub pa yin zhes bya zhe na /
translated: Why is the establishment of the existence of another called the establishment of the non-existence of that?

original: so sor ma grub pa'i phyir dang / 'brel pa med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: so sor ma grub pa'i phyir dang / 'brel pa med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because they are not established separately and because they are not related.

original: re zhig gzhan yod pa ni sgrub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: re zhig gzhan yod pa ni sgrub pa ma yin no //
translated: The existence of another is not the establishment of the non-existence of that.

original: gang zhig grub pa na gang mi 'grub pa ni de'i rtags yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig grub pa na gang mi 'grub pa ni de'i rtags yin te /
translated: That which is not established when something is established is the reason for that.

original: me dang du ba lta bu yin no //
analyzed: me dang du ba lta bu yin no //
translated: It is like fire and smoke.

original: gzhan yod par grub pa nyid kyis /
analyzed: gzhan yod par grub pa nyid kyis /
translated: The establishment of the existence of anotherüîΩis not the establishment of the non-existence of that.

original: de med par grub ste de las gzhan pa dang 'brel pa med pa'i ngo bo can de'i de nyid rnam par 'jog par byed pa'i tshad ma kho nas gzhan rnam par bcad pa 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med par grub ste de las gzhan pa dang 'brel pa med pa'i ngo bo can de'i de nyid rnam par 'jog par byed pa'i tshad ma kho nas gzhan rnam par bcad pa 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is established without that, because the valid knowledge that posits the suchness of that entity that has no relation to anything other than that establishes the exclusion of other.

original: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir dang / de de'i rtags yin na de dang der 'brel pa 'ga' zhig tu 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir dang / de de'i rtags yin na de dang der 'brel pa 'ga' zhig tu 'gyur te /
translated: If there were no relation, and if that were the reason for that, there would be some relation between them.

original: dper na byas pa nyid dang / mi rtag pa nyid dag don gcig la 'du ba dang rtags don gcig la 'du ba'am /
analyzed: dper na byas pa nyid dang / mi rtag pa nyid dag don gcig la 'du ba dang rtags don gcig la 'du ba'am /
translated: For example, it would be like the inclusion of the state of being produced and the state of being impermanent in the same object, or the inclusion of the reason and the object in the same object,

original: rten dang brten pa'i dngos po'am bskyed par bya ba dang / skyed par byed pa'i dngos po lta bu zhig yin grang na /
analyzed: rten dang brten pa'i dngos po'am bskyed par bya ba dang / skyed par byed pa'i dngos po lta bu zhig yin grang na /
translated: or the relationship of the basis and the based, or the relationship of the produced and the producer.

original: dngos po yod pa dang / med pa dag la ni gang gis na 'di'i bsgrub par 'gyur ba'i 'brel pa de lta bu 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: dngos po yod pa dang / med pa dag la ni gang gis na 'di'i bsgrub par 'gyur ba'i 'brel pa de lta bu 'ga' yang med do //
translated: But in the case of existent and nonexistent things, there is no such relation by which this would be established.

original: gal te yul dang yul can gyi dngos po yod de /
analyzed: gal te yul dang yul can gyi dngos po yod de /
translated: If you say that the relationship of object and object possessor exists,

original: sgra dang don 'brel pa bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: sgra dang don 'brel pa bzhin no zhe na /
translated: like the relation of sound and meaning,

original: sgra dang don dag ni de ston na sbyor bas de dang lhan cig gi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam med na mi 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: sgra dang don dag ni de ston na sbyor bas de dang lhan cig gi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam med na mi 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel bar 'gyur na /
translated: The word and the object are related as cause and effect, or as that which is invariably concomitant, when the word is applied to indicate the object.

original: rnam pa 'di yang 'di la med pas ji ltar yul dang yul can gyi dngos po yin /
analyzed: rnam pa 'di yang 'di la med pas ji ltar yul dang yul can gyi dngos po yin /
translated: But this relation does not exist in this case, so how can there be the relation of object and subject?

original: de gnyis bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub pa'i dngos por grub na ni /
analyzed: de gnyis bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub pa'i dngos por grub na ni /
translated: If the two were established as that which is to be established and that which establishes,

original: de'i sgo nas yul dang yul can gyi dngos por 'gyur na /
analyzed: de'i sgo nas yul dang yul can gyi dngos por 'gyur na /
translated: then, on that basis, there would be the relation of object and subject.

original: de nyid ni 'brel pa med na mi 'grub po //
analyzed: de nyid ni 'brel pa med na mi 'grub po //
translated: But that is not established if there is no relation.

original: de ma grub na yul dang yul can gyi dngos po yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de ma grub na yul dang yul can gyi dngos po yang ma yin no //
translated: If that is not established, there is no relation of object and subject.

original: de lta ma yin na 'di gcig la gcig brten pa yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na 'di gcig la gcig brten pa yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were otherwise, there would be mutual dependence.

original: gzhan yod pa las med pa grub na spyi bsgrub par bya ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan yod pa las med pa grub na spyi bsgrub par bya ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: If nonexistence were established from the existence of another, the universal would not be that which is to be established.

original: de lta na ni de las gzhan pa yod pa'i phyir bum pa med do zhes bya ba las bum pa thams cad na thams cad du med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na ni de las gzhan pa yod pa'i phyir bum pa med do zhes bya ba las bum pa thams cad na thams cad du med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were so, then since it would exist as something other than that, it would follow that the pot would not exist, and that the pot would not exist in any place whatsoever.

original: gal te ma yin te phyogs la sogs pa chos can med par sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro snyam ste /
analyzed: gal te ma yin te phyogs la sogs pa chos can med par sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro snyam ste /
translated: If you think that is not so, because the subject, such as the direction, is established as nonexistent,

original: 'di snyam du phyogs la sogs pa chos can khyad par du gyur pa'i med pa sgrub par byed @249b kyi /
analyzed: 'di snyam du phyogs la sogs pa chos can khyad par du gyur pa'i med pa sgrub par byed @249b kyi /
translated: then you think that the subject, such as the direction, is established as a nonexistent that is qualified by being different from the pot.

original: 'ba' zhig ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not established as just that.

original: des na spyi mi sgrub pa yang ma yin la /
analyzed: des na spyi mi sgrub pa yang ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, it is not the case that the universal is not established.

original: yod pa dang phyogs la sogs pa chos can du 'brel pa'i phyir rtags dang rtags can 'brel pa med pa yang ma yin no snyam du sems na ma yin te /
analyzed: yod pa dang phyogs la sogs pa chos can du 'brel pa'i phyir rtags dang rtags can 'brel pa med pa yang ma yin no snyam du sems na ma yin te /
translated: And because existence and the subject, such as the direction, are related, it is not the case that the reason and the property to be proven are unrelated.

original: phyogs la sogs pa nyid de gzhan pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyogs la sogs pa nyid de gzhan pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If you think that, you are wrong, because the direction itself is something other than that.

original: phyogs gang kho na na gang zhig med do zhes bya ba de nyid de dang 'brel pa med pa'i gzhan yod pa yin te /
analyzed: phyogs gang kho na na gang zhig med do zhes bya ba de nyid de dang 'brel pa med pa'i gzhan yod pa yin te /
translated: That very direction in which something does not exist is something other than that which is unrelated to it.

original: de mthong ba kho nas 'di bum pa med do snyam du sems na /
analyzed: de mthong ba kho nas 'di bum pa med do snyam du sems na /
translated: If you think that the mere seeing of that [empty place] is the cognition of the absence of a pot,

original: ji ltar de kho na rtags dang rtags can gyi dngos po yin /
analyzed: ji ltar de kho na rtags dang rtags can gyi dngos po yin /
translated: how can that [empty place] be the evidence and the pot the evidential property?

original: 'dir gang gis na spyi ni gtan tshigs su 'gyur la khyad par ni chos can du 'gyur zhes bya ba spyi dang khyad par gyi dngos po rnam par brtag pa yang mi srid de /
analyzed: 'dir gang gis na spyi ni gtan tshigs su 'gyur la khyad par ni chos can du 'gyur zhes bya ba spyi dang khyad par gyi dngos po rnam par brtag pa yang mi srid de /
translated: Here, it is also impossible to conceive of the relation between a universal and an instance, where the universal is the evidence and the instance is the evidential property,

original: de'i khyad par rtogs pa kho nas de med par rtogs pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: de'i khyad par rtogs pa kho nas de med par rtogs pa'i phyir la /
translated: because the mere cognition of the instance is the cognition of the absence of the universal,

original: de la rjes su 'gro ba yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la rjes su 'gro ba yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and because there is no pervasion [of the instance by the universal].

original: dam bcas pa'i phyogs gcig yin pa'i phyir yang rtags nyid ma yin no //üîΩgang na phyogs tsam yod pa de na bum pa med pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: dam bcas pa'i phyogs gcig yin pa'i phyir yang rtags nyid ma yin no // gang na phyogs tsam yod pa de na bum pa med pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Nor is it the evidence because it is only a part of the thesis.üîΩAnd it is not the case that where there is only a part of the thesis, there is an absence of the pot.

original: gal te phyogs 'ba' zhig yin pa de lta bu ni med pa kho na yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te phyogs 'ba' zhig yin pa de lta bu ni med pa kho na yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that such a mere part does not exist,

original: de 'ba' zhig ces bya ba bum pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: de 'ba' zhig ces bya ba bum pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: isn‚Äôt a mere part just the same as being devoid of a pot?

original: 'dir rtags su gyur pa de yang phyogs rtogs pa kho nar grub pa yin na /
analyzed: 'dir rtags su gyur pa de yang phyogs rtogs pa kho nar grub pa yin na /
translated: Here, if the evidence is established only as a known property of the subject,

original: de de gang gi rtags yin /
analyzed: de de gang gi rtags yin /
translated: then what is the evidence of what?

original: rjes su 'gro ba smos pa yang don med pa yin no //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba smos pa yang don med pa yin no //
translated: And the mention of concomitance is also meaningless.

original: de lta bas na gzhan yod pa ni dngos po med pa'i sgrub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na gzhan yod pa ni dngos po med pa'i sgrub pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the existence of another is not the proof of the absence of an entity.

original: gal te 'gal ba'i 'brel pa yod de de'i phyir gzhan yod pa las dngos po med pa 'grub po zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'gal ba'i 'brel pa yod de de'i phyir gzhan yod pa las dngos po med pa 'grub po zhe na /
translated: If you say that there is a relation of contradiction, and therefore the absence of an entity is established from the existence of another,

original: gang zhig gang dang 'gal /
analyzed: gang zhig gang dang 'gal /
translated: then what is contradicted by what?

original: gzhan yod pa dang zlo bor ro //
analyzed: gzhan yod pa dang zlo bor ro //
translated: The existence of another is contradicted by its opposite.

original: ci gang gis rtags dang rtags can 'gal ba'i 'brel par 'gyur ba zlo bo gzhal bar 'dod dam /
analyzed: ci gang gis rtags dang rtags can 'gal ba'i 'brel par 'gyur ba zlo bo gzhal bar 'dod dam /
translated: Do you assert that the opposite is cognized by what makes the evidence and the property of the thesis contradictory?

original: dngos po med pa ni zla bo bum pa yod pa dang 'gal ba med de /
analyzed: dngos po med pa ni zla bo bum pa yod pa dang 'gal ba med de /
translated: The absence of an entity is not contradicted by the existence of the opposite, the pot,

original: lhan cig gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhan cig gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they coexist.

original: gzhal bya de la rtags dang rtags can dag ji ltar 'gal /
analyzed: gzhal bya de la rtags dang rtags can dag ji ltar 'gal /
translated: How can the evidence and the property of the thesis be contradictory in that object to be cognized?

original: de bas na 'brel pa med do //
analyzed: de bas na 'brel pa med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no relation.

original: 'di la yang spyi bsgrub par bya ba nyid ma yin bde'i so na 'dug go //
analyzed: 'di la yang spyi bsgrub par bya ba nyid ma yin bde'i so na 'dug go //
translated: Here too, the establishment of the general is not the same as the establishment of the particular.

original: de med pa dang / gzhan yod pa dag 'brel pa med na /
analyzed: de med pa dang / gzhan yod pa dag 'brel pa med na /
translated: If the absence of that and the existence of another are not related,

original: gzhan yod par rtogs kyang de rtogs par mi 'gyur ba yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan yod par rtogs kyang de rtogs par mi 'gyur ba yin nam zhe na /
translated: then even if the existence of another is understood, how could that be understood?

original: 'brel pa gang las kyang gzhan yod pa de med pa'i shes par byed pa yin par mi 'dod kyi /
analyzed: 'brel pa gang las kyang gzhan yod pa de med pa'i shes par byed pa yin par mi 'dod kyi /
translated: We do not assert that the existence of another is understood from any relation.

original: 'on kyang gzhan yod pa nyid de med pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang gzhan yod pa nyid de med pa yin te /
translated: However, the existence of another is itself the absence of that.

original: ji skad sngar bshad pa yin @250a * //
analyzed: ji skad sngar bshad pa yin @250a * //
translated: This is as was previously explained.

original: no // gzhan dang 'brel pa med pa'i ngo bo 'ba' zhig pa bdag nyid gcig pu rnam par gnas pa de /
analyzed: no // gzhan dang 'brel pa med pa'i ngo bo 'ba' zhig pa bdag nyid gcig pu rnam par gnas pa de /

analyzed: me mthong yang gang gis na chu don du gnyer ba 'jug par 'gyur ba me 'ba' zhig kho na ni ma yin no //

analyzed: chu ma yin no zhes bya bar mi shes pas /
translated: Therefore,

analyzed: 'dug par yang mi bya /

analyzed: brgal dka' ba'i skabs su chud par gyur to //
translated: Thus, you are in a difficult situation.

analyzed: gal te gcig mthong ba de kho nas gzhan med par rtogs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you think that just by seeing one you would understand that the other is absent,

analyzed: ji ltar gcig mthong bas gzhan med do zhes bya bar rtogs par 'gyur /

analyzed: gal te 'ba' zhig mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If you think it is because you see only one,

original: 'di nyid kho bos bshad pa na /
analyzed: 'di nyid kho bos bshad pa na /
translated: then this is exactly what I have explained.

original: ci ste khyod 'di la ma rangs pa ltar ston /
analyzed: ci ste khyod 'di la ma rangs pa ltar ston /
translated: Why do you act as if you do not like this explanation?

analyzed: de lta bas na 'gram ma mthong ba'i bya bzhin du ring du song yang phyir 'ong dgos pas /

analyzed: de na khyad par med par @250b gzhan thams cad med par 'grub par 'gyur bas /

translated: Therefore, it is not necessary to state the distinction that the nonestablishment of a thing is established by the nonobservation of an observed object that is suitable to appear.

original: der dmigs pa'i rig byar ma grub pa rnams kyang rnam par bcad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: der dmigs pa'i rig byar ma grub pa rnams kyang rnam par bcad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because those that are not established as observed objects there are also excluded.

original: de'i bdag nyid gcig yongs su bcad pas de las gzhan pa'i bdag nyid rnam par bcad pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid gcig yongs su bcad pas de las gzhan pa'i bdag nyid rnam par bcad pa yin te /
translated: The exclusion of an identity that is different from that is by the determination of that very identity.

original: de'i bdag nyid du nges par snang ba shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid du nges par snang ba shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the cognition of the appearance as that identity is ascertained.

original: de'i bdag nyid ni de las gzhan pa'i bdag nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid ni de las gzhan pa'i bdag nyid ma yin no //
translated: The nature of that is not the nature of anything else.

original: gzhan gyi bdag nyid rnam par ma bcad na /
analyzed: gzhan gyi bdag nyid rnam par ma bcad na /
translated: If the nature of something else is not excluded,

analyzed: 'jug pa dang ldog pa dag med pas thal ba snga mar 'gyur ro //
translated: then there would be no engagement and no disengagement, and the previous absurd consequence would follow.

original: yul dang dus dang ngo bo nyid dang gnas skabs su nges pa de blos de'i bdag nyid du dmigs pa na 'di'i de kho na nyid med pa rnam par gcod do //
analyzed: yul dang dus dang ngo bo nyid dang gnas skabs su nges pa de blos de'i bdag nyid du dmigs pa na 'di'i de kho na nyid med pa rnam par gcod do //
translated: When the mind observes the nature of that object, which is ascertained as to place, time, nature, and condition, it excludes the nonexistence of that reality.

original: gal te gzhan gyi dngos po rnam par bcad par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te gzhan gyi dngos po rnam par bcad par gyur na /
translated: If the nature of something else is excluded,

original: de ltar na gdong de des yongs su bcad pa dang / de kho na nyid kyang de de kho na'i yin gyi gzhan gyi ma yin no zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de ltar na gdong de des yongs su bcad pa dang / de kho na nyid kyang de de kho na'i yin gyi gzhan gyi ma yin no zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: then the face is ascertained as that, and that reality is just that and not something else.

original: gzhan du gyur pa rnam par gcod pa nyid de yongs su gcod pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du gyur pa rnam par gcod pa nyid de yongs su gcod pa yin no //
translated: The exclusion of the transformation of that is the ascertainment of that.

original: de bas na tshad ma gcig 'jug pa ni dngos po thams cad phung po gnyis su rnam par 'jog par byed de /
analyzed: de bas na tshad ma gcig 'jug pa ni dngos po thams cad phung po gnyis su rnam par 'jog par byed de /
translated: Therefore, the engagement of a single valid cognition posits all things in two groups.

original: de ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i blo'i rgyu nyid kho nas 'bras bu dang bcas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i blo'i rgyu nyid kho nas 'bras bu dang bcas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is only the cause of the cognition of the positive and negative concomitance that has an effect.

original: de las ma gtogs pa ma lus pa rnam par bcad pas khyab pa sgrub pa kho nas rnam pa gzhan med par grub po //
analyzed: de las ma gtogs pa ma lus pa rnam par bcad pas khyab pa sgrub pa kho nas rnam pa gzhan med par grub po //
translated: And by the exclusion of everything else apart from that, the pervasion is established, and thus the non-existence of any other mode is established.

original: de de las gzhan pa nyid kyis ma khyab par /
analyzed: de de las gzhan pa nyid kyis ma khyab par /
translated: If it were not pervaded by that,

original: des don de rnam par ma bcad pa'i phyir yang dngos po yongs su ma bcad par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des don de rnam par ma bcad pa'i phyir yang dngos po yongs su ma bcad par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then by that, that object would not be excluded, and it would follow that the entity would not be excluded.

original: de lta bas na /
analyzed: de lta bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: tshad ma'i byed pa ni 'ga' zhig la tshad ma 'jug pa de ni /
analyzed: tshad ma'i byed pa ni 'ga' zhig la tshad ma 'jug pa de ni /
translated: the activity of valid cognition is that when valid cognition engages in something,

original: yongs su gcod cing de las gzhan pa ni rnam par gcod la /
analyzed: yongs su gcod cing de las gzhan pa ni rnam par gcod la /
translated: it excludes that from what is other than that,

original: rnam pa gsum pa gzhan ni med par sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba 'di yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa gsum pa gzhan ni med par sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba 'di yin no //
translated: and it establishes that there is no third alternative.

original: 'di ltar 'ga' zhig la tshad mar 'jug pa ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'ga' zhig la tshad mar 'jug pa ni /
translated: Thus, when valid cognition engages in something,

original: de las gzhan pa las rnam par gcod de /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa las rnam par gcod de /
translated: it excludes that from what is other than that.

original: de nyid yongs su gcod pa dang de las gzhan pa nyid de las rnam par gcod pa dang de las yongs su mi gcod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid yongs su gcod pa dang de las gzhan pa nyid de las rnam par gcod pa dang de las yongs su mi gcod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it eliminates that, it eliminates what is other than that, and it does not eliminate what is not other than that.

original: de'i phyir tshad ma de nyid rnam pa gzhan med par sgrub par byed de /üîΩde snang na mi snang pa thams cad ni de @251a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir tshad ma de nyid rnam pa gzhan med par sgrub par byed de / de snang na mi snang pa thams cad ni de @251a * //
translated: Therefore, that valid cognition establishes the absence of other aspects.

original: las gzhan pa nyid du rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: las gzhan pa nyid du rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir la /
translated: Because when it appears, all that does not appear is posited as other than that,

original: de las gzhan pa ma yin pa nyid ni de nyid du rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa ma yin pa nyid ni de nyid du rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and because what is not other than that is posited as that itself.

original: 'dis ni rim dang rim ma yin pa la sogs pa phan tshun rnam par gcod pa'i ngo bo can dag kyang rnam par bcad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni rim dang rim ma yin pa la sogs pa phan tshun rnam par gcod pa'i ngo bo can dag kyang rnam par bcad pa yin no //
translated: By this, the mutually exclusive natures such as sequential and non-sequential are also eliminated.

original: de lta bas na de ltar gcig dmigs pas de'i de las gzhan pa'i bdag nyid rnam par gcod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de lta bas na de ltar gcig dmigs pas de'i de las gzhan pa'i bdag nyid rnam par gcod pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, in this way, by the apprehension of one, the identity of that which is other than that is eliminated.

original: de'i yul dang dus dag tu gzhan yod pa thams cad rnam par gcod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i yul dang dus dag tu gzhan yod pa thams cad rnam par gcod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But the existence of everything else in its place and time is not eliminated.

original: de lta bas na de'i bdag nyid ma yin par yang 'gyur la /
analyzed: de lta bas na de'i bdag nyid ma yin par yang 'gyur la /
translated: Thus, it would not be of the nature of that object,

original: de'i yul dang dus dag tu'ang 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i yul dang dus dag tu'ang 'gyur te /
translated: and it would be in the place and time of that object,

original: ro dang gzugs la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ro dang gzugs la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: like a form or taste, etc.

original: de lta bas na ji skad bshad pa'i mi dmigs pa kho na las res 'ga' la la zhig tu 'ga' zhig dngos po med par 'grub bo //
analyzed: de lta bas na ji skad bshad pa'i mi dmigs pa kho na las res 'ga' la la zhig tu 'ga' zhig dngos po med par 'grub bo //
translated: Therefore, non-apprehension alone, as explained, establishes the non-existence of something somewhere at some time.

original: gzhan yod pa'i yul can gyi dmigs pa yang de med pa'i sgrub par byed par 'dod pa kho na yin gyi rtags nyid du ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yod pa'i yul can gyi dmigs pa yang de med pa'i sgrub par byed par 'dod pa kho na yin gyi rtags nyid du ni ma yin te /
translated: The apprehension of the object of the existence of another is accepted as the proof of its non-existence, but not as the reason.

original: der yang dngos po med pa logs shig tu sgrub par byed pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: der yang dngos po med pa logs shig tu sgrub par byed pa nyid yin la /
translated: For, in that case, non-existence would be established separately.

original: 'brel pa med par mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa med par mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And because it is similar to the absence of a connection.

original: rtags 'byung ba'i dus su kho na na de med par 'grub pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rtags 'byung ba'i dus su kho na na de med par 'grub pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the non-existence of that is established only at the time of the occurrence of the reason.

original: gzhan yod pa rtogs nas 'dod de rtogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag rab tu bsgrubs nas de med par rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yod pa rtogs nas 'dod de rtogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag rab tu bsgrubs nas de med par rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: For, having understood the existence of another, one does not understand its non-existence by establishing the concomitance and the reverse concomitance of that understanding.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

analyzed: de las gzhan pa rtogs pa kho na ni de med pa rtogs te / mthong ma thag tu chod pa med par 'di ni yod do //
translated: The other, which is the realization of the absence of that, is the realization of the nonexistence of that.

analyzed: 'di ni med do zhes bya bar shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is known immediately upon seeing that ‚Äúthis exists‚Äù and ‚Äúthat does not exist‚Äù without any obstruction.

analyzed: de ni gang zhig gang gis rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa de'i rtags yin pa'i dpe ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is not an established example of a reason that is concomitant with and divergent from that.

original: 'di skad du /
analyzed: 'di skad du /
translated: It is said:

original: gang na gzhan yod pa'i dmigs pa yod pa de na de med do zhes bstan par ni mi nus te /
analyzed: gang na gzhan yod pa'i dmigs pa yod pa de na de med do zhes bstan par ni mi nus te /
translated: ‚ÄúWhere there is the observation of the existence of another, there is the nonexistence of that‚Äù cannot be taught,

original: dmigs pa gcig pu de ni gang na yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa gcig pu de ni gang na yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that single observation does not exist anywhere.

original: spyir rab tu bstan pa'i dpe la yang tshad ma gzhan med pa'i phyir de las gzhan pa yod pa dmigs pa de nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi sgrub par byed pa yin pas /
analyzed: spyir rab tu bstan pa'i dpe la yang tshad ma gzhan med pa'i phyir de las gzhan pa yod pa dmigs pa de nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi sgrub par byed pa yin pas /
translated: Also, in a general teaching, there is no other valid knowledge in an example, and therefore the observation of the existence of that other is the proof of the probandum.

original: dpe thug pa med pa nyid kyi phyir rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dpe thug pa med pa nyid kyi phyir rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, because the example is endless, it is not established.

original: de lta bas na rtags gang las kyang dngos po med pa mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: de lta bas na rtags gang las kyang dngos po med pa mi 'grub bo //
translated: Therefore, nonexistence is not established from any reason.

original: mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid kyi mi dmigs pas grub pa gzhan yod pa de ni rtogs pa la dngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa sgrub par byed pa yin pas zhar la 'ongs pas cho ga @251b go //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid kyi mi dmigs pas grub pa gzhan yod pa de ni rtogs pa la dngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa sgrub par byed pa yin pas zhar la 'ongs pas cho ga @251b go //
translated: The other, which is established by non-apprehension, the characteristic of perception, is the proof of the designation of non-existence in regard to the object of cognition.

original: mi dmigs pa de ni rnam pa gsum ste /üîΩrgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po grub la /üîΩdngos po med par grub pa'i rgyu mi dmigs pa dang / khyad par bya ba dang / khyad par byed pa grub la /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa de ni rnam pa gsum ste / rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po grub la / dngos po med par grub pa'i rgyu mi dmigs pa dang / khyad par bya ba dang / khyad par byed pa grub la /
translated: This non-apprehension is of three kinds:üîΩ1. Non-apprehension of cause and effect, which is the proof of non-existence of an existent thing;

analyzed: dngos po med par grub pa'i khyad par byed pa'i mi dmigs pa dang / rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: 2. Non-apprehension of the pervader, which is the proof of non-existence of a thing that has been established as a particular;üîΩ3. Non-apprehension of intrinsic nature.

original: de la rgyu dang khyab par byed pa dag gi ngo bo nyid dngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa 'grub pa yang gzhan yod pa grub pa kho na las yin no //
analyzed: de la rgyu dang khyab par byed pa dag gi ngo bo nyid dngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa 'grub pa yang gzhan yod pa grub pa kho na las yin no //
translated: The designation of non-existence of the nature of cause and pervader is established only from the establishment of the existence of another.

original: de ltar grub pa de ni 'bras bu dang / khyab par bya ba dag dngos po med pa'am /
analyzed: de ltar grub pa de ni 'bras bu dang / khyab par bya ba dag dngos po med pa'am /
translated: The establishment of that is the non-existence of the effect and pervaded.

original: dngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa grub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa grub par byed pa yin no //
translated: and the non-existence of a thing is established by the non-apprehension of that thing.

original: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa la ni mi dmigs pa rtags su gyur pas tha snyad gdags pa kho na sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa la ni mi dmigs pa rtags su gyur pas tha snyad gdags pa kho na sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: In the case of the non-apprehension of an intrinsic nature, the non-apprehension itself is the logical mark that establishes the mere designation.

original: gal te rgyu dang khyab par byed pa de las gzhan yod par grub pa'i ngo bo mi dmigs pas grub pa dag / gzhan dngos po med pa'am dngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa sgrub par byed la /
analyzed: gal te rgyu dang khyab par byed pa de las gzhan yod par grub pa'i ngo bo mi dmigs pas grub pa dag / gzhan dngos po med pa'am dngos po med par tha snyad gdags pa sgrub par byed la /
translated: If the non-apprehension of an existent entity that is different from the cause or the pervader establishes the non-existence of another, then it establishes the designation of the non-existence of that other.

original: de yang mi dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa de gnyis kho na'i med par tha snyad gdags pa'i sgrub par byed pa yin na /
analyzed: de yang mi dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa de gnyis kho na'i med par tha snyad gdags pa'i sgrub par byed pa yin na /

analyzed: de gnyis ji ltar lkog tu sbyor ba yin /

analyzed: rtags ma nges pa'i phyir tshad ma nyid kyis ni /
translated: Because the logical mark is not ascertained, it is not a valid cognition.

original: sbyor ba ma yin pa kho na'i rgyu dang khyab par byed pa 'brel pa grub pa dag gal te med na gzhan gdon mi za bar med par nges so zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir 'di dag sbyor ba 'ba' zhig tu zad do //

translated: If there were no such things as the cause of what is not a property of all, and the pervader that is related to the probandum, then the absence of the other would certainly be ascertained.

analyzed: de lta bas na phyogs kyi chos 'di rjes su 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang ldan pa yin pas /

analyzed: de'i chas khyab pa mtshan nyid gsum pa'i gtan tshigs rnam pa gsum kho na shes par byed pa yin te /
translated: it is the three kinds of reason that have the three characteristics that are known to be the cause of the ascertainment of the probandum.

original: rang gi bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //

original: gzhan dag ni gtan tshigs mtshan nyid drug pa'o zhes zer te /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni gtan tshigs mtshan nyid drug pa'o zhes zer te /
translated: Others say that the reason has six characteristics.

analyzed: gsum po de dag dang / gnod par ma byas pa'i yul can nyid dang / grangs gcig pa brjod par 'dod pa can nyid dang / shes pa nyid ces bya ba yin no //
translated: They are the three mentioned above, plus being not refuted, being the one that is desired to be stated, and being known.

analyzed: de la re zhig gnod par ma byas pa'i yul can nyid ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa nyid ma yin te /

original: gnod pa dang med na mi 'byung ba dag 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnod pa dang med na mi 'byung ba dag 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because harm and non-occurrence are contradictory.

original: med na mi 'byung ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos yod pa kho na gtan tshigs yod pa yin no /
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos yod pa kho na gtan tshigs yod pa yin no /
translated: Non-occurrence is the existence of the reason only when the property to be established exists.

original: ji ltar chos can la @252a * //
analyzed: ji ltar chos can la @252a * //
translated: How is it in the subject?

original: de lta bu'i mtshan nyid kyi gtan tshigs kyang yod par 'gyur la /
analyzed: de lta bu'i mtshan nyid kyi gtan tshigs kyang yod par 'gyur la /
translated: The reason with such a definition would also exist.

original: 'di la bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyang med par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di la bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyang med par 'gyur /
translated: And the property to be established would not exist in this.

original: mngon sum dang / rjes su dpag pa bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la gnod par zhugs pa dag ni /
analyzed: mngon sum dang / rjes su dpag pa bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la gnod par zhugs pa dag ni /
translated: Direct perception and inference that engage in harming the property to be established

original: de chos can de las zlog par byed la /
analyzed: de chos can de las zlog par byed la /
translated: reverse that from the subject.

original: de yod pa kho nas gtan tshigs yod pa ni /
analyzed: de yod pa kho nas gtan tshigs yod pa ni /
translated: The existence of the reason only by the existence of that

original: de chos can de la 'jug par byed pas /
analyzed: de chos can de la 'jug par byed pas /
translated: causes it to engage in the subject.

original: kye ma dngos po rnams rab tu nyam nga bar gyur to //
analyzed: kye ma dngos po rnams rab tu nyam nga bar gyur to //
translated: Alas, things have become very dangerous.

original: gal te gzhan la gtan tshigs bsgrub par bya ba'i chos med na ni mi 'byung ba yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te gzhan la gtan tshigs bsgrub par bya ba'i chos med na ni mi 'byung ba yin gyi /
translated: If the property to be proven does not exist in the other, then the reason does not occur.

original: chos can kho na la ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: chos can kho na la ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But if it does not exist in the subject alone,

original: de ci ste nyon mongs 'di ma ning bcibs nas du tshol bar byed dam /
analyzed: de ci ste nyon mongs 'di ma ning bcibs nas du tshol bar byed dam /
translated: then why does this opponent ride a neuter donkey and search for feces?

analyzed: gang zhig chos can la bsgrub par bya ba med kyang yod pa de nye bar bstan nas /
translated: If the property to be proven does not exist in the subject but exists in the other, then having demonstrated that,

analyzed: chos can de bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang ldan pa zhes ji skad du bya /
translated: how could one say that the subject possesses the property to be proven?

original: gal te de nyid kyi phyir gnod pa med pa smos te /
analyzed: gal te de nyid kyi phyir gnod pa med pa smos te /
translated: If you say that you mention that it is nondeceptive for that reason,

original: 'di snyam du gang gi phyir /
analyzed: 'di snyam du gang gi phyir /
translated: then think about this:

original: kho nar gtan tshigs gzhan du yang yod par 'gyur ba de kho na'i phyir tshad ma dag gis gnod par ma byas pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i chos can zhes bya'o snyam du sems na /
analyzed: kho nar gtan tshigs gzhan du yang yod par 'gyur ba de kho na'i phyir tshad ma dag gis gnod par ma byas pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i chos can zhes bya'o snyam du sems na /
translated: If you think, ‚ÄúBecause the reason would exist in other subjects, we say that the subject possesses a property that is not undermined by valid knowledge,‚Äù

original: de dag gnod pa med pa kho nas bsgrub par bya ba grub pa'i phyir gtan tshigs la nus pa ci zhig yod /
analyzed: de dag gnod pa med pa kho nas bsgrub par bya ba grub pa'i phyir gtan tshigs la nus pa ci zhig yod /
translated: then what power does the reason have to prove the property to be proven, since it is only nondeceptive?

original: bsgrub par bya ba med pas gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma 'jug par nges pa zhig yin na ni gnod pa med na bsgrub par bya ba 'grub pas gtan tshigs don med do //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba med pas gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma 'jug par nges pa zhig yin na ni gnod pa med na bsgrub par bya ba 'grub pas gtan tshigs don med do //
translated: If it is certain that a valid cognition that contradicts it operates when the probandum does not exist, then since the probandum is established when there is no contradiction, the reason is pointless.

original: gnod pa yod na yang sgrub pa nus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnod pa yod na yang sgrub pa nus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And if there is contradiction, then the proof is powerless.

original: ma nges pa zhig yin na ni /
analyzed: ma nges pa zhig yin na ni /
translated: If it is uncertain,

original: gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma yang med par 'gyur la /
analyzed: gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma yang med par 'gyur la /
translated: then a valid cognition that contradicts it does not exist.

original: bsgrub par bya ba med pa yang srid pas gnod pa med pa la nus pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba med pa yang srid pas gnod pa med pa la nus pa med pa yin no //
translated: And since it is possible that the probandum does not exist, then the absence of contradiction is powerless.

original: gnod pa med pa ni gnod pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: gnod pa med pa ni gnod pa med pa yin no //
translated: The absence of contradiction is not a contradiction.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is it?

original: gnod pa mi dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: gnod pa mi dmigs pa yin te /
translated: It is the non-observation of a contradiction.

original: de yang la lar gnod pa srid kyang skyes bu la yod par 'gyur bas /
analyzed: de yang la lar gnod pa srid kyang skyes bu la yod par 'gyur bas /
translated: And that is sometimes possible even when there is a contradiction, as in the case of a person.

original: de ni gtan tshigs sbyor ba'i yul yin no //
analyzed: de ni gtan tshigs sbyor ba'i yul yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is the domain of the application of reasons.

original: gtan tshigs gnod pa dmigs pa la'ang 'jigs kyi /
analyzed: gtan tshigs gnod pa dmigs pa la'ang 'jigs kyi /
translated: One fears that a reason may be observed to be contradictory.

original: gnod pa la mi 'jigs sam ci na gang gis na gnod pa tshod yod par byas te mi dmigs pa la'ang sbyor bar 'dod /
analyzed: gnod pa la mi 'jigs sam ci na gang gis na gnod pa tshod yod par byas te mi dmigs pa la'ang sbyor bar 'dod /
translated: Why would you not fear that there is no harm? Why would you make the harm limited and wish to apply the nonobservation of a harm?

original: gtan tshigs de ni don dam par gnod pa yod dam med kyang rung ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs de ni don dam par gnod pa yod dam med kyang rung ste /
translated: The reason is that whether or not there is harm ultimately,

original: mi ltos par gnod pa mi dmigs pa la sbyar bar bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi ltos par gnod pa mi dmigs pa la sbyar bar bya ba'am /
translated: you should apply the nonobservation of a harm without relying on it.

original: ci'i phyir sbyar bar bya /
analyzed: ci'i phyir sbyar bar bya /
translated: Or why would you apply it?

original: bsgrub par @252b bya ba bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par @252b bya ba bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is in order to establish the probandum.

original: des la lar gnod pa yin bzhin du yang bsgrub par bya bsgrub par byed dam ci gang gis na 'di med par nges par bya ba la 'bad par yang mi byed la /
analyzed: des la lar gnod pa yin bzhin du yang bsgrub par bya bsgrub par byed dam ci gang gis na 'di med par nges par bya ba la 'bad par yang mi byed la /
translated: But does it sometimes establish the probandum even though there is harm? If so, why would you not also not make an effort to ascertain its nonexistence,

original: gtan tshigs kyang sbyor /üîΩde lta na yang gnod par byas pa'i yul can nyid /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyang sbyor / de lta na yang gnod par byas pa'i yul can nyid /
translated: but apply the reason?

original: gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid ma yin te /
translated: Even though that is so, the subject that is harmed is not the definition of the reason.

original: gnod pa yod bzhin du yang 'dis nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnod pa yod bzhin du yang 'dis nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is able to establish the probandum even though there is harm.

original: de lta na yang the tshom can la khas ma blangs na /
analyzed: de lta na yang the tshom can la khas ma blangs na /
translated: Even though that is so, if you do not accept the existence of doubt,

original: 'jug pa mi rung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'jug pa mi rung ba'i phyir /
translated: it is not suitable to engage in debate.

original: ji ltar mi dmigs pa la gnod pa yod pa srid na yang khas blangs nas /
analyzed: ji ltar mi dmigs pa la gnod pa yod pa srid na yang khas blangs nas /
translated: Just as, when it is possible that there is an objection to a non-observation, one accepts it and

original: sbyor ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: sbyor ba de bzhin du /
translated: applies it,

original: gnod pa mi dmigs pa la yang sbyor bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnod pa mi dmigs pa la yang sbyor bar 'gyur ro //
translated: so too, one should apply it when there is no observation of an objection.

original: khas len na khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khas len na khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no difference when one accepts.

original: gal te gnod pa yod na mi nus so zhe na //
analyzed: gal te gnod pa yod na mi nus so zhe na //
translated: If there is an objection, it is not possible.

original: gal te de lta na sbyar kyang mi nus par 'gyur du 'ong bas /
analyzed: gal te de lta na sbyar kyang mi nus par 'gyur du 'ong bas /
translated: If it is like that, it is possible that one will not be able to apply it,

original: gnod pa mi srid par gtan la ma bab par sbyor bar 'os pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gnod pa mi srid par gtan la ma bab par sbyor bar 'os pa ma yin no //
translated: so it is not appropriate to apply it without having determined that an objection is impossible.

original: gal te gnod pa mi dmigs na /
analyzed: gal te gnod pa mi dmigs na /
translated: If there is no observation of an objection,

original: nus so snyam na /
analyzed: nus so snyam na /
translated: it is possible.

original: dmigs pas gnod pa la khyab bam ci na /
analyzed: dmigs pas gnod pa la khyab bam ci na /
translated: What is the point of observing an objection?üîΩIf one determines that the reason is not pervaded by the objection,

original: gang gis na 'di ltar gtan tshigs gnod pa srid pas byas pa'i nus pa med par mi 'gyur ba de log na /
analyzed: gang gis na 'di ltar gtan tshigs gnod pa srid pas byas pa'i nus pa med par mi 'gyur ba de log na /
translated: then when the reason is reversed, the objection is reversed.

original: gnod pa ldog / de lta na yang gnod pa mi dmigs pa kho na las bsgrub par bya ba 'grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gnod pa ldog / de lta na yang gnod pa mi dmigs pa kho na las bsgrub par bya ba 'grub pa'i phyir /
translated: Even so, because the probandum is established only from the non-observation of an objection,

original: gtan tshigs don med pa yin te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs don med pa yin te /
translated: the reason is pointless.

original: mi dmigs na gnod pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi dmigs na gnod pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because if there is no observation, there is no possibility of harm.

original: dmigs pa log kyang gnod pa mi ldog na ni /
analyzed: dmigs pa log kyang gnod pa mi ldog na ni /
translated: If, even though the object is refuted, the harm is not refuted,

original: gtan tshigs nus pa med pa de'i son 'dug pas sbyor ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs nus pa med pa de'i son 'dug pas sbyor ba ma yin no //
translated: then the reason is powerless, and so the syllogism is not valid.

original: de lta bas na chos can la rang gis bsgrub par bya ba yod pa dang / med pa dag las gzhan du yang yod pa ni cung zad kyang sgrub par mi byed 'jig par yang mi byed pas /
analyzed: de lta bas na chos can la rang gis bsgrub par bya ba yod pa dang / med pa dag las gzhan du yang yod pa ni cung zad kyang sgrub par mi byed 'jig par yang mi byed pas /
translated: Thus, with regard to the subject, the reason neither proves nor disproves anything other than the property to be established, and it neither proves nor disproves anything other than the property to be refuted.

original: de nye bar bkod pa ni nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de nye bar bkod pa ni nus pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not a valid reason.

original: de lta bas na gnod pa dang med na mi 'byung ba dag ni lhan cig yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta bas na gnod pa dang med na mi 'byung ba dag ni lhan cig yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Thus, harm and nonobservation do not occur together.

original: des na gnod pa med pa'i ngo bo gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: des na gnod pa med pa'i ngo bo gzhan ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the absence of harm is not a different entity from the reason.

analyzed: de de las khyad par gzhan nam mtshan nyid gcig tu smos par 'os par 'gyur na /

original: gang zhig yod bzhin du yang gang zhig gzhan du 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: gang zhig yod bzhin du yang gang zhig gzhan du 'gyur ba ste /
translated: But if it is a different attribute, then what is it that is different from what?

analyzed: dper na phyogs kyi chos nyid dang mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa zhes bya ba lta bu zhig yin grang na /
translated: For example, if it is like the case of the property of the subject, which exists in accordance with the property of the subject,

analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba yod bzhin du gnod pa srid pa 'di ni med pas bsgrub par bya ba dang / bzlog pa med na mi 'byung ba gtan tshigs @253a * // dang 'gal ba dag gi yul la gnod pa mi srid pa'i phyir /
translated: then since it is possible that there is an existent that is not pervaded by the reason, and it is possible that there is a contradiction, the object of the probandum and the contradictory reason are not pervaded by the reason.

original: de med pa ni /
analyzed: de med pa ni /
translated: Therefore, since it is impossible that there is a contradiction,

original: logs shig tu 'di gnyis kyi mtshan nyid nyid du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: logs shig tu 'di gnyis kyi mtshan nyid nyid du brjod par bya'o //
translated: the definition of these two should be stated separately.

original: de lta bas na gtan tshigs sbyor ba la dam bcas pa'i nyes pa rnams mi srid do //
analyzed: de lta bas na gtan tshigs sbyor ba la dam bcas pa'i nyes pa rnams mi srid do //
translated: Therefore, the faults of the thesis are impossible in the application of the reason.

original: dam bcas pa 'ba' zhig sbyor ba yang med pas dam bcas pa'i nyes pa brjod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dam bcas pa 'ba' zhig sbyor ba yang med pas dam bcas pa'i nyes pa brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: Since there is no application of only the thesis, the faults of the thesis should not be stated.

original: 'dis ni grangs gcig brjod par 'dod pa can yang bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni grangs gcig brjod par 'dod pa can yang bsal ba yin no //
translated: This also eliminates the one who wishes to state the single number.

original: ci lta bu gcig ni rang gis bsgrub par bya ba yod pa kho nas yod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ci lta bu gcig ni rang gis bsgrub par bya ba yod pa kho nas yod pa'i phyir /
translated: Since the one that is like that is only existent because of the existence of the probandum,

original: der 'khrul pa med pa can yin no //
analyzed: der 'khrul pa med pa can yin no //
translated: and it is not erroneous with respect to that.

original: de nyid la de las gzhan pa de gnod par byed pa kho na yang yod pa'i phyir de dang 'gal bas 'dir gnod pa dang mtshungs so //
analyzed: de nyid la de las gzhan pa de gnod par byed pa kho na yang yod pa'i phyir de dang 'gal bas 'dir gnod pa dang mtshungs so //
translated: And it is not erroneous with respect to that, because it is contradicted by that which is other than that.

original: gzhan yang ci dngos su gtan tshigs kyi zla bo mi srid pa de yang dag pa'i shes pa'am /
analyzed: gzhan yang ci dngos su gtan tshigs kyi zla bo mi srid pa de yang dag pa'i shes pa'am /
translated: Moreover, is the non-existence of the counter-evidence of the reason in reality the cause of the correct cognition,

original: bzlog pa'i rgyu yin nam /
analyzed: bzlog pa'i rgyu yin nam /
translated: or is it the cause of the reversal of the cognition?

original: 'on te gtan tshigs kyi zla bo rab tu ma bstan pa zhig yin /
analyzed: 'on te gtan tshigs kyi zla bo rab tu ma bstan pa zhig yin /
translated: Or is it the non-teaching of the counter-evidence of the reason?

original: cir 'gyur / gal te gtan tshigs kyi zla bo ma bstan pa zhig yin no zhe na ni /üîΩnges par bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir /
analyzed: cir 'gyur / gal te gtan tshigs kyi zla bo ma bstan pa zhig yin no zhe na ni / nges par bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir /
translated: What is the consequence? If it is the non-teaching of the counter-evidence of the reason,

original: 'di mtshan nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di mtshan nyid ma yin no //
translated: then it is not a characteristic, because it cannot be ascertained.

original: gtan tshigs med pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs med pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And it is not the non-existence of the reason,

original: sgrub bar byed pa'i chos ma nges pa'i bdag nyid ni /
analyzed: sgrub bar byed pa'i chos ma nges pa'i bdag nyid ni /
translated: because the nature of the unestablished property of the probandum

original: de'i mtshan nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid ma yin te /
translated: is not its characteristic,

original: phyogs kyi chos the tshom can bzhin no //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos the tshom can bzhin no //
translated: like the doubtful property of the subject.

original: the tshom can gyi mtshan nyid ni /
analyzed: the tshom can gyi mtshan nyid ni /
translated: And the doubtful characteristic

original: gtan tshigs kyang ma yin pas /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyang ma yin pas /
translated: is not the reason,

original: 'ga' yang gtan tshigs su mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'ga' yang gtan tshigs su mi 'gyur te /
translated: No one of these is a logical reason.

original: mtshan nyid mtshungs pa la zla bo srid pa mthong na /
analyzed: mtshan nyid mtshungs pa la zla bo srid pa mthong na /
translated: When one sees that there is a possibility of an opponent in a case of similar characteristics,

original: zla bo ma mthong ba la yang dogs pa skyed par byed de khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zla bo ma mthong ba la yang dogs pa skyed par byed de khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: one generates doubt even when there is no opponent seen, because there is no difference.

original: khyad par yod na ni gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid yin te /
analyzed: khyad par yod na ni gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid yin te /
translated: If there is a difference, then it is the characteristic of a logical reason.

original: des gnyen po gcig tu bsal ba'i gtan tshigs kyis rang gi bsgrub par bya ba nges par byed pas de'i mtshan nyid can ma yin pa gtan tshigs su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des gnyen po gcig tu bsal ba'i gtan tshigs kyis rang gi bsgrub par bya ba nges par byed pas de'i mtshan nyid can ma yin pa gtan tshigs su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Since that logical reason, which has completely eliminated the counter-reason, ascertains its own probandum, it is not a logical reason that does not have that characteristic.

original: de lta na grangs gcig brjod par 'dod pa can don med pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta na grangs gcig brjod par 'dod pa can don med pa yin no //
